author: {'steamid': '76561198032644791', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 1169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1518792877}
review:
Easily one of the better games I have played. Could hardly stop long enough to write this review.

Overview:
You start out on the shores of who knows where and how you got there... well that doesn't matter. As you need to scavenge for your suvival.

From beach torn shorts to blazing glory you can hunt, craft, and tame things around you. As you work your way through quest after quest you grow stronger and the monsters you venture across become not only more dangerous but bigger and more blood thirsty.

Gameplay:
I would have to say for a game that has only been out for a little under 2 months. This is already a great game with hours and hours of fun for you and your friends. The fact that Multiplayer is easy as saving and switching worlds makes this fun for everyone.

Crafting, Building, Farming, Taming, Fishing, Fighting, and more... this game has it all. I can't wait to see what updates come out in the future. I hope they add more things to tame and more of a free roam feel with out the quests being the main progression.

Pros:
Great game play, a lot of things to do and a lot of different places to explore.

Easy if you want, excruciatinly difficult if you want as well.

Graphics are fairly decent and several different times I found myself just looking around... at what I built, at the wild, and at the beaches.

Multiplayer really is awesome, easy as switching a previously saved world to the multiplayer mode.

Random Generated worlds.... differnt every time. Gotta love that.

Cons:
Grind grind grind grind.... Takes a lot of time to advance to the next phase/crafting/equipment 

The only thing you can tame that helps you fight is the goblin... kinda boring and not very useful.


To sumerize I think it was easily worth the $7 I spent on it and would for sure recommend this game to anyone looking to spend a few hours in a great game, farming, buildling, and having fun with or without your friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164600074', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1519518039}

author: {'steamid': '76561198129767654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1296, 'last_played': 1520541014}
review:
아.. 지구력이라. 참 괴로운 스탯이네. 뭘 할려고 해도 지쳐서 파밍도 못하고 도망도 못 치고  비추한다. 

맵도 더럽고 . 길이 온통 나무나  풀 등으로 가려져 있어서 탐험이 힘들다. 

컨텐츠가 부족한건가  아니면 유저를 괴롭힐려고 그러는건가 이해가 안간다. 

점프도 없고. 작은 언덕 하나 못 올라가거나내려가지 못해서 멀리 돌아서 가는 사태가 벌어진다. 

더 짜증나는건 멀리 돌아가는것이 다가 아니라 도끼를 들고  일일이 다 길을 개척해야된다는거지.  

화면 하나 이동하는데 도끼질로 5분이상 걸리는게 무슨 개같은 상황이냐. 

지구력이 모잘라서 한참을 쉬었다가 다시 나무 하나 패고 쉬고 그러다가 몹 하나 달라들면

처 맞고만 있어야 되니 미치는거지. 도망도 못 치고 죽는게 허다하다. 

그래픽은 내가 딴지를 걸지 않을께. 20년전 게임 수준이라도 게임성만 좋으면 되니깐 말이다.

자금이 모잘라는 작은 게임업체한테 할 소린 아니니까 넘어가고. 

자유도라는 측과 탐험 이라는것. 생존 기술과 갖가지 위험도. 온도를 적용시킨것 바서 

더 롱 다크나 기타 생존 게임 요소를 집어넣었는데. 왜 만들다 만거냐? 

이것이 고쳐지지 않는 이상에는 이 게임 하는건 그냥 발암일뿐이지. 



 ---------------------------


지금 사는건 비추다. 가격을 매긴다면 5천원 정도.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037319778', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 10231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3832, 'last_played': 1652177829}
review:
Firstly, the game is well worth the money, but it is very annoying to actually play.

The combat is boring.  The progression system was made by someone who is clearly super pedantic and sets out to annoy you with illogical nonsense.  E.g. I can make a anvil easily, but cant make an iron weapon because the stupid quest system hasnt unlocked it yet...seriously?  Are you trying to make this as annoying as possible?  The other thing is you're walking along trying to see forward and suddenly half a dozen animals ambush you, which means you lose loads of stuff that took innumerable mouse clicks to acquire.

I recommend the game because it's super cheap for the effort that went into it, but the author really designed it to be as annoying as possible,

author: {'steamid': '76561198139298288', 'num_games_owned': 2920, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 735, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 706, 'last_played': 1555199397}
review:
El juego es muy bueno, ya que con el paso del tiempo el desarrollador si lo ha estado mejorando.
Los mundos se generan aleatoriamente, todos los mapas son enormes, todo se puede destruir para craftear, las criaturas se regeneran, los animales igual,etc.

Tiene modo supervivencía y modo mision.
Los gaficos estan bien junto con los efectos visuales, la jugabilidad es igual que minecraft y terraria.
Yo fui uno de los primeros que compro el juego y la verdad esta muy bien. la comunidad ya cada vez es mas grande.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995142404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 5534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1686, 'last_played': 1557613186}
review:
Having a very fun time!  It's survival and crafting in its purest form.  

Graphics are very nice.  The survival mode has a very linear levelling/quest system which I appreciate: limits the player's focus early on while gradually adding quests that introduce new mechanisms and craft items.  

I paid less than $4 for it!  How can this be??

There's a bit of a fanatasy element to the game as well - you'll be combating goblins, skeletons, as well as natural predators.  

Can be a little on the grindy side, with slower pace.  But it's not too bad and is adding a harsh survival aspect to the early game.  Better tools and some neat devices will help speed things along as you progress. 

Liking it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198080268954', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 2347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2153, 'last_played': 1518480770}
review:
I won't lie, this game is a slow and painful grind. If you're looking for story it isn't here. That does not mean it is a bad game. It runs on my potato of a laptop VERY well. As far as I can understand, most resources are finite and it pushes you to progress. 

If you are looking for a relaxed casual survival game with freedom to explore slowly, this is probably not for you.

Good:
- Pretty graphics
- Nice sounds
- Crafting recipies are easy and available in the menu, so you don't have to look up a guide
- I think the worlds are randomly generated but don't quote me on that
- Very bingable
- Very easy for beginners, the quest system basically holds your hand the whole way but you can do things at your own pace
- Controls are easy to get used to and use
- Very polished

Bad:
- Building things indoors is a complete pain because you can barely fit anything into 1 building. As for solutions to this maybe they can make it so 2 of the same houses being next to each other can connect or generally increasing the capacity of a house. (By houses i mean all of the indoor buildings)
- Questionable replay value. The game takes so long to do a lot of things
- Missing the value of all the ore shards and force of nature pieces we collect, idk if a story will be added at some point but either than gaining access to the next level, they are kind of pointless.
- Those palm leaves are such a pain to get. Make sure you don't die when you collect them because they seem to be very limited in supply. (Not sure if jungle trees drop them)
- I don't really like the force of nature pieces being a requirement to level up, they're really hard to get to let alone collect. It does push you to advance but I'm not entirely sure of their value or why I should collect them.
- Quest system holds you're hand a bit too much, but if you don't want a complicated questing system then ignore this point.
- Minions are too underpowered to be useful as anything more than body and damage shields. I often find myself throwing myself in front of them as a shield because if the enemy aggros on the minion it's almost gaurenteed death for them. A goblin minion can't face anything higher than another goblin and it certainly can't kill anything without help from the player.

All in all an amazing game. Very well executed and something I will binge for a longggggg time if my 18 hours in 3 days means anything.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006083401', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 816, 'last_played': 1517649766}
review:
Фермогриндилка. Т.е. у нас есть возможность строить кучу всего и крафтить по цепочкам разные ништяки, плюс куча респавнящихся после перезапуска игры мобов, которых можно разбирать на ресы с разной степенью успешности (иногда разбирают вас). Энергия перса восстанавливается медленне, чем вырастает посаженная на грядках пшеница, так что да, еды надо много и часто.
  Камера намертво привязана к герою. И туман, туман повсюду, нихрена дальше двух шагов не видно. Продвижение по уровням привязано к выполнению заданий вроде построй это, накопи  того.
  При смерти часть ресов из инвентаря пропадает, как и убившие тебя мобы. И если ты идиот и забыл выложить золотые слитки, требующиеся для перехода на следующий уровень, и попал под раздачу с летальным исходом - остается два выхода: фармить ещё пару часиков или забить и удалить "игру" нафиг. 
 Для развлечения на планшете ещё бы пошло, для игры на компе - нет. Это мое сугубо частное мнение, ясное дело.

author: {'steamid': '76561198442638133', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1578886351}
review:
Es un buen juego de supervivencia, aventura, construcción y acción.. aunque le falta cosas como: agregar más recursos, redusir el tiempo de algunas creasiones (crafteos), agrega una barra de abilidades y nibeles como por ejemplo: al comienzo te da para elejir una clase... gerrero, albañil, arquero, pescador, etc... tambien tendrian que agregar mas armas y redusir el coste de estamina y tambien redusir el daño y belosidad de algunos enemigos...

Fuera de todo eso es un buen juego y tiene buen potencial y puede mejorar 

ATENTAMENTE: Francisco Castignani

author: {'steamid': '76561198076304884', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 953, 'last_played': 1678585369}
review:
It's a pretty fun game, guaranteed time sink. I like it though. Nice to come back after a tough day and just relax, farming, cutting trees, listening to nature. The Devs I think are rush-ian (ha, because they rush to give updates to satisfy their consumers gettit) and update the game by a monthly basis. Pretty awesome, considering the satured kickstarter stuff that comes out often.

Unlike most open-world games, there's an objective. Levelling-up means achieving experience and resources, not constantly standing in an open field farming goblins and wild animals. It's a good feeling to have a farm set up within walls and gates to protect from the monsters. Goblins are nasty little buggers that'll swarm you and take you down, and your farms, if they catch you off guard.

Imagine my surprise when I found out you can tame one. A little disappointed you only can tame literally one, but to watch a level 7 gobbo kick his cousins level 1 ass is fun. Now I want to open up a gladiator arena where I leave my gobbo and aggro a bunch of monsters and lead them into the death cage. Whoever wins gets to be my second-in-command, with their own little hovel.

To say this game is accesible would be incorrect as many people like action and drama. But I like this peaceful world. At least, peaceful until you bump into a biome you never seen and run, watching your second-in-command get beat the crap out of from a glowing golem monster four times it's size. 

Then you come, make a portal, kick ass, and get a shard of nature. The whole objective, as far as I can tell, is that you're a wizard that teleports and wants to grow your magic power through the shard things. 

I got a couple complaints. One is that I can't name any one of my animals or gobbo, which sucks. Two is that I just want to pet them. Who is a good little gobbo? Yes you are! You are!. Three is that I should be able to command an army of the green suckers. Maybe see them change textures or weapons as their level gets higher would be neat too. 

Bottom line: Don't buy this game unless you are willing to invest time. If you're expecting minecraft, this might not be for you. Since you can refund, give the game an hour and see if you're willing to sit and dig dirt for seven minutes straight. (or just *pretend* you bought it, like I did)

Good luck fellow wizards and their pet gobbo's. May many palisades defend your home!

author: {'steamid': '76561198284666085', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1517432846}
review:
Looked cool at first. However, once I got into the game there were a ton of issues. The tutorial was alright but the gameplay is just awful. The controls are some of the worst I've used in a game for gathering resources, the menu system is strange and not very user friendly, the crafting and building seems very lazy at best. Having to craft things that take way too long to collect and craft for something simple then having to do that about 5 times for each resource just to get to the next step of crafting just to build something as simple as a small chest takes wayyy too long. There is no customizability when it comes to building either. There is one set model for each thing which is boring because you are not able to actually build a base or a home for maximum efficiency. Seems like they took the lazy way out and made things drag on so the game seems more interesting and seems longer than it actually is.

Game has potential but if it continues like this  I for one won't be playing it much longer. Unfortunate because it could have been a great game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992690466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 1122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1122, 'last_played': 1516923874}
review:
Bonjour,
Notez que je n'ai testé le jeu qu'en coop, je l'ai pas terminé et je viens de me lever là, à l'instant. 
Malgré ça, je sais quoi en dire sur Force of Nature.

... Rhuumm rhhhuuummm ... *échauffe sa voie*

Je naquis sur une plage en ce jour avec mes deux frères, Leblanc et Lemarron. Sans parent, sans rien appart mes deux frères. Heureusement, nous étions pourvus d'instinct et on s'est dessuite mis au travail.
Notre objectif premier était de ... Oh .. ! Un lapin ! CHOPEZ LEEEEEEEEE !! CHOPEZ LE LAPIN, CHOPEZ-LE !!! Ha ! Il s'est enfuit... On doit surv.. s'installer en ces lieux.

On a donc décidé qu'on allait tout défoncer, tu vois, les arbres, les pierres, les plantes, les ... HA ! JE L'AI RETROUVE !!! IL ETAIT COINCER DANS CES PUTAINS DE NÉNUPHARS !! VENEZ !! TIENT PREND TOI CA LE LAPIN, DANS TA GUEULE ! TIENT TIENT TIENT !! CREVE POURRITUUUUUUUUUREEEEEE !!! ... Et finalement, c'était pas mal comme coin ! Y'avait la mer juste a coté, on avait notre petit feu de bois et notre hutte soigneusement craft avec des palmes et du bois. Osef de la pluie, de la bouffe, et du beau temps puisque nous sommes ensemble !

Après avoir détruit la flore avoisinante, il fallait qu'on bouge pour ... UN COCHON ! PETIT PETIT ... PETIT COCHON ! COINCEZ LE ! HAHAHA EN TRIANGLE IL EST COINCE !! HA MAIS IL SE DÉFEND LE PORC ! TUEZ LE !!! CREVE POURRITURE D'ANIMAL ! CREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEVE !!!
Et voilà, on a des vêtements ! :D
Hihihi il est mort le cochon.. HAAAA DES POULES !!! TUEZ LES POULES !!! POT POT POT ... MEEEEEURT .. !!!
Désolé, je m'emporte. En même temps, comment résister à l'appel du meurtre ?
Du coup, on a décidé de ramasser des champignon etc ... Des trucs a bouffer quoi, même si on a pas faim, ça fait toujours plaisir quand c'est gratuit alors on s'est mis a déboiser complètement la foret et à vider les champs.. Héhéhé, j'avais des centaines de ..

Mais .. C'est bien ce que je crois .. ? C'est un gobelin ? OH MAIS IL NOUS ATTAQUE EN PLUS LE CON ! HA TU VA PRENDRE TARIF ESPECE DE SAC A M**** !! TIENT COUP DE BATTE DANS L'OEIL !! ON LE FINIT PAR TERRE DEVANT SA FAMILLE !!! PAS DE PITIER POUR LES INFIDELES !! DECEEEEEEDEEEEEE !!!!
Aaah ... Ca fait du bien :) !
Et quand on est arrivé vers le nord putain qu'est ce qu'il faisait chaud ! Ou froid .. Je sais plus mais on a du faire des vêtements pour chercher le fragment de la nature ! *COUIC COUIC COUIC* LE RENARD ! JE T'AI DECOUPE POUR ME FAIRE DES BOTTES HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA !!!
Donc on est rentré au camp, on a construit des trucs... Genre un four, une enclume pour faire des épée , des flèche et toussa toussa ... On a fait une cuisine et puis .. Et puis .. J'AI TROUVE UNE CHEVRE !! BAAAAAAAH LA CHEVRE , BAAAAAAAH .... BAAM DANS TA GUEULE LA CHEVRE ! ELLE SURVIT PAS ! ELLE SURVIT PAS ON L'ACHEVE LA CHEVRE !!
Qu'est ce qu'il nous reste a tuer maintenant ... ? Les poules, les lapins , les porcs , les chèvres, les renards, les moutons, les vaches ( oui les vaches on peut les tuer aussi hihihihihi meuuuuh ! Hiiihihihihi) les gobelins, les ours ! Hahaha ! 

J'ADORE TUER LES ANIMAUX ET DETRUIRE LA NATURE !! JE REVE D'UNE MER NOIRE DE MAZOOT OU TOUT LES ANIMAUX SONT MORTS ET D'UNE TERRE PLATE DEVASTEE SANS VIE , ARBRES NI PIERRES ! HAHAHHAHA !! TUER @_@ .. !!!!!

Appréciation positive. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197993348154', 'num_games_owned': 579, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 5291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5170, 'last_played': 1517349790}
review:
Force of Nature is a bit difficult to describe.  It mixes so many elements from so many genres that it seems to refuse classification.

Minecraft, Dungeons & Dragons, and Banished seem to create the core of FoN.  Add to that small bits of SimCity, XCOM, and 7 Days To Die, and perhaps just a faint whiff of WarCraft.  The end result is fascinating and compelling, even without much of a story.

Steady character progression, crystal clear quests, nicely challenging with a smooth difficulty curve, fascinatingly different mechanics from any other game I've ever seen, and a gigantic world to explore, fight, and loot; Force of Nature will hold your attention far longer than you'd ever expect.

I just wish I could craft pants a bit earlier.

author: {'steamid': '76561198216501956', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 4040, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4040, 'last_played': 1515429231}
review:
クラフト系のゲームが好きならおすすめできます。
しかしサバイバルではありません。
食品や飲み物は体力とスタミナの回復薬です。

クエストという名のお使いをこなさないとクラフトレベルが解放されないシステムで、
単純作業感が強く中盤からはダレます。
戦闘が単調な殴り合いになりがちなので、いっそRPG要素を廃して
クラフトとサバイバルに全振りして欲しかった。

テンポはよく、UIもわかりやすいのでさっくり遊べます。
値段も安いのでその点もおすすめです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198052130069', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1515076818}
review:
Lourd, lourd, lourd !

Gameplay, déplacement, lourd, lent, mou ou on se fait que cliquer ...

Interface lourd, pas intuitif, qui bloque les actions dans le monde. Une fois la fenêtre des crafts ouverte, impossible de récupérer le craft dans a la fenêtre de construction, obliger de fermer et de rouvrir ... caméra qui ne pivote plus une fois une fenêtre ouverte ... que des "petites" choses dans le style mais qui accumulée pourrisse le jeu

Aucun plaisir a jouer

author: {'steamid': '76561198047867653', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1520927288}
review:
直訳もありますが日本語対応なので、言語の壁はないかと。
操作を理解するのに時間が掛かった。
UIを改善しないとサクサク行かずテンポも悪くなる。
一度採ったアイテムは復活しないので、
クラフト時に何を優先するかで、
次に必要な物の素材がなくてそこで詰む。

まだ序盤ですが空腹とかはそれほどシビアではなさそう。
今後どうなるか期待は持てます。

2月１０日追加

前回
＜クラフト時に何を優先するかで、
＜次に必要な物の素材がなくてそこで詰む。
と書きましたが実は素材集めの手段ありました。

そして、プレイモードは２種類あり、
「一般」の方がアイテム作成時の条件があり、
素材がなくて詰むと感じた方でした。
「創造」の方は自由に作れるので好きなように作れます。
アップデートありましたが、まだUIは以前のままで
相変わらずテンポ悪いですし、操作は面倒な感じがします。
サバイバルにしては何かすると気力が減っていくものの、
何もしないでも自然回復するし、空腹で云々はまだ遭遇してないです

review: Force of Nature is a very time consuming game, but you can drop it and pick it back up again without any issue. Crafting and collecting materials takes a lot of petience, as well as advancing in questing/leveling. This is absolutley not an instant gratification type game. Would I reccomend it? If you have the time and patience, Yes.

review:
Игра классная, давно в подобные игры не играл (никогда не играл).
Достиг 6-го уровня в игре.
Складирую воду в бочках, потому что в колодце вода больше 6-ти едениц не накапливается :/
Понравилось загонять зайцев под подсолнухи и бить их дубиной с гвоздями.
Постоянно получал лещщя от местных аборигенов.
Жаль не видно звёздное небо ночью.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027776268', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 2185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1399, 'last_played': 1518394445}
review:
不错的游戏,单机稍微单调,多人联机很不错.我跟朋友都在玩, 有一齐的请加我STEAM 或者微信号 Q46954252 注明是游戏的.现在已有人一齐玩了.希望你的加入^-^  另外关于游戏, 希望能继续开发多点元素. 例如是就职 或者是增加故事或许情节..   或许随机出现NPC,彩蛋,骑宠什么的.
总体来说可以打7分. 
感觉画面可以接受+1分
多人游戏网络几乎没延迟,就算中国跟纽约+1分
开放式建筑和摆设+1分
动物种类,装备种类, 衣服种类+1分
效果声音和打击感+1分
细节处理,例如需要工具做什么.高级工具可以简短制作时间+1分  
料理补给,种菜,后勤+1分
部分BUG有修复,更新较慢,但还是会更新+1-1
游戏刷新不能刷新部分资源, 部分资源要好好利用   +1-1  因为豪华基地不一定随便做的出来.
扣一分没跑步和休息或者表情,
扣一份多人游戏时快捷键部分失灵 , 
扣一分性别没的选,没有外表设置例如脸部高矮.(仅有肤色和发色不够).

author: {'steamid': '76561198020004785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1075, 'last_played': 1519325291}
review:
I love it! :D 
I just bought this game because it looked like  a decent survival game. The reviews didn't look so good, but oh, they are so wrong. :D 
I just couldn't stop playing it! There is really a LOT to do in this game, the mechanics are pretty good, it's fun to play, all the good parts are there and there are hardly any bad parts!
It really reminds me of stranded 2, and I was looking everywhere to see a game similar to that. It has all that, and more, and I really like it! 
I haven't tried the multiplayer just yet, but the single player is vast too. :) Highly recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198123597490', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1166, 'last_played': 1527438493}
review:
Ciertamente les faltan pulir algunas cosas, pero una vez que te sentas a jugarlo perdes el sentido del tiempo y te entretenes. Si sos de los survivals, este es un buen juego que te va a dar una experiencia un poco diferente. Sencillo por momentos y complicado por otros. Considero que los desarrolladores pongan mas filo y terminen algunos conceptos, pero la realidad es que van por un buen camino.
Interesante para probarlo en coop por mas que el multijugador este en beta. Recomendado 100%

author: {'steamid': '76561198071815937', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 10900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9257, 'last_played': 1575406757}
review:
Das ist ideal zum Entspannen nach der Arbeit, ich habe keinen Zeitdruck, das Spiel zwingt mich zu nichts.
Dennoch stellt es lösbare Aufgaben, weist kaum Fehler auf und Spielabstürze waren bisher recht selten.
Ich kann solo spielen, oder bis zu 3 Freunde einladen auf meinen eigenen Server. Im Laufe der Zeit hat sich gezeigt, dass gewisse Einschränkungen auch schon mal etwas nervig aufkommen, wie etwa Brunnenwasser, das scheinbar immer zu knapp ist, oder zu wenig angesammelt werden kann, für die Bedürfnisse im späteren Fortschritt.
Dennoch rundum gelungen und für mich genau das richtige Spiel. Besonders positiv aufgefallen ist mir, dass es in deutsch spielbar ist und keinerlei Übersetzungsmängel gezeigt hat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064919995', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1714, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1210, 'last_played': 1516655474}
review: This game provides an excellent sandbox environment which offers many building, crafting, and taming opportunities to its players. Many people who have viewed the game play have described it as “a relaxed crafting environment which provides just the right level of challenge and goals”. My son has noted that he enjoys the parallels to Minecraft with more of an understandable goal and purpose to playing the game. As I continue to explore this game one thing of note is the size and style of the map. This provides a clash of old and new gaming realms as I can’t help but think of Zelda for NES as I push further from the pebbly beach shore.  I don’t exactly know what to expect from this game and its developers in the near future but, what I do know (coming from someone to tested Minecraft via Steam in Beta) this game has the potential to top Minecraft and draw in crowds from the differing corners of sandbox and RPG together in gaming bless!

author: {'steamid': '76561198030516476', 'num_games_owned': 5534, 'num_reviews': 465, 'playtime_forever': 12889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5928, 'last_played': 1587060855}
review:
Attention jeu hautement addictif !!!! wow wow wow j'ai lancé ce jeu pour essayer comme ça à la vas vite et en 2/3 jours de temps j'ai accumulé 42h dessus !!!! Difficile d'en décrocher !!!! (je me suis même fait toute une journée dessus du matin jusqu'au lendemain matin 5h non stop !!!! un truc de malade !!!!).

Beaucoup le comparent à "don't starve", je ne crois pas, don't starve a ses mécaniques et un style graphique qui lui sont propres, mais dans l'idée il y a quelques légères similitudes...

Je ne pense pas avoir vu de craft aussi développé et réaliste dans d'autres jeux jusqu'ici. Un petit exemple sans vouloir trop spoiler : pour fabriquer un cocktail (style smoothie ou milk shake fruité) il vous faudra d'abord récolter des pommes en chemin, puis cultiver des fraises, mais pour celà il faudra d'abord vous fabriquer des planches de semi, y mettre de la terre que vous derez pelleter à la force de vos bras mais sans outils impossible, puis vous aurez besoin d'accessoires de cuisine et même d'une cuisine, d'une forge pour les outils, d'une ferme pour y élever des vaches à lait et autres animaux qu'il vous faudra capturer, apprivoiser et aussi nourrir.

Il y a un tas de choses à faire dans ce jeu, construire une base rudimentaire au départ qui évoluera au fil des niveaux acquis. Pour augmenter les niveaux de votre personnage vous aurez des petites quêtes à réaliser. Doucement mais surement vous allez faire évoluer votre campement de fortune en un véritable petit village dans lequel vous serez le seul habitant, vous pourrez même y ajouter des décorations.

Entre la popote, la culture, la nourriture de vos animaux, la pêche, la confection de vêtements, d'outils, d'armes diverses vous risquez de passer un long moment dans votre petit chez vous. Mais rester sédentaire n'est pas le meilleur des choix.
Après vous être paré comme il faut il vous faudra partir en exploration, affronter les ennemis, trouver de nouvelles matières premières et je suppose trouver un moyen de rentrer chez vous.

Oui rentrer chez vous car vous vous réveillez là un matin échoué sur cette plage au milieu de cocotiers, sans savoir ce qui a bien pu vous arriver, ni ce que vous foutez là.

Il y a différents biomes sur la carte, heureusement vous pourrez fabriquer des portails de téléportation pour voyager plus rapidement. 
Mais attention ces biomes n'ont jamais été explorés vous allez vous enfoncer dans une jungle dense qu'il faudra défricher pour vous frayer un chemin. 

C'est un des points négatifs du jeu, cette phase de défrichage pourra en rebuter plus d'un, car vous perdez vite en endurance, ce qui ralentira votre avancée. Si vous n'avez pas prévu et emporté assez de nourriture, vous devrez retourner dans vos quartiers pour vous concocter des recettes afin de vous retaper en énergie, et cela va vous prendre réellement beaucoup de temps.

Dans certains biomes il fait très chaud, dans d'autres très froid, vous aurez besoin de certains types de vêtements pour y entrer au risque de voir baisser rapidement votre santé ou votre endurance.

Votre but principal est d'explorer ces différents biomes (7 au total je crois) dans l'espoir d'y trouver une pierre spéciale qui vous servira à .... euh je ne sais pas encore lol

A l'heure actuelle j'ai exploré 5 biomes, c'est long, très long (personnellement ça ne m'a pas gênée) mais les impatients vont surement se lasser avant la fin du jeu. 
Il va falloir pas mal d'heures et de patience, il vous faudra aussi apprendre à bien gérer et vous préparer avant de partir en combat, car les ennemis ne sont pas simples, et  si à votre grand malheur vous veniez à décéder en combat vous respawnez sur la plage près de votre base mais vous perdrez une grande quantité d'objets de votre inventaire.

Le jeu fait souvent des sauvegardes et aucun soucis de ce côté là.
Je n'ai rencontré aucun bug, les graphismes peuvent paraitre pas terrible au premier abord mais au final on s'y habitue et tout compte fait ce n'est pas si mal, les animaux et ennemis sont plutôt bien réalisés, les gobelins (vous pourrez en apprivoiser un pour combattre à vos côtés) sont tous mignons je trouve.

La gestion de la caméra peu vous paraitre assez hasardeuse et même vous agacer, mais tout est question de prise en main, une fois qu'on a pris l'habitude ça passe...

Pour la musique de fond, je n'ai pas trop compris, il n'y en a pas, à part le bruit des petits oiseaux et différents bruitages, mais parfois à certains endroits vous l'entendrez (rarement et pas longtemps) alors que dans les options il me semble y avoir vu une case permettant de  choisir de jouer les mêmes en boucle ou tout le répertoire.

Les succès steam ne se débloqueront que si vous jouez en solo. Je ne peux vous parler de l'option multi qui ne m'a pas intéressée pour ce jeu et que je n'ai donc pas testée.

J'ai modifié un peu mon évaluation ce jour (15/05/2018) suite à une critique dans les commentaires, il est vrai que j'ai peut être insisté un peu trop les côtés positifs sans appuyer sur les côtés qui peuvent fâcher. 
Mais mon avis reste inchangé, même si je me dois de souligner que ce jeu n'est pas fait pour tout les amateurs de survie, ceux qui ne jurent que par le multi, le PVP et la possibilité de crafter des armes de guerre de malade pour dégommer tout ce qui bouge seront déçus.
Mais pour ceux qui aiment le solo, qui aiment se poser tranquillement et prendre leur temps, réfléchir, gérer, s'organiser et choisir les bonnes tactiques d'approche lors des combats, ce petit jeu est un vrai régal.




[code][h1][b]Si vous avez apprécié cette évaluation et souhaitez en lire d'autres venez suivre ma [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/39072619/]page de curation[/url].[/b][/h1][/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198032167311', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 10835, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1738, 'last_played': 1577221312}
review:
This game is pretty alright. I got in in a sale for just a few bucks n played it for about 16 hours n there's still plenty to explore. The interface is kinda clunky but alright once you get used to it and learn the hotkeys. The quest system I found to be pretty good, nicely navigating you through the game. You can fight, farm, build n craft n forage n explore - it ain't amazing but it's fairly fun and enjoyable, at least for me. If you don't like grinding, this won't be the game for you though - you do a lot of it in this game. It's also a lot about resource and work management with all the different crafting stations, hrowing herbs and harvesting goods from animals. 
If you enjoy games like minecraft, this should be a fun time for ya.
I only have a single complaint. I wish there was a way to pet my animals. Even if it's just a button that makes my lill chicken cluck happily with no other use. Let me pet my cow. Let me pet my piggy! LET ME PET MY GOBLIN! HE'S A GOOD BOY!!!
So yea, 7/10, good job devs <33

author: {'steamid': '76561198013977080', 'num_games_owned': 47, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 22448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14538, 'last_played': 1604846251}
review:
I would describe this game as a "casual" survivalist/exploring/crafting/mining/farming type of game.  There isn't a lot of stress involved in this game.  You can't starve or die of thirst, but you can run out of Stamina.  When that happens you just stand there and do nothing until you recover enough Stamina to move.  The only way to die in this game is to be killed by other critters.

You only have the one avatar, a male.  You can change the color of his cut-off pants, and his hair, and nothing else.  The only view you will ever have is from behind your avatar, so it really doesn't matter.  The combat is extremely simple - click to hit, with no manuvering or complex animations.  The graphics are also simple, but nice.

Part of the fun of these types of games is figuring them out, so I will not give anything away.  I will say one thing about the game mechanics.  While you are playing the game the critters you kill never respawn.  However, when you save and exit the game the next time you reload the saved game to play, you always start at the beginning (no matter where you were when you saved your game) and all the critters will have respawned.  

If you are looking for a casual, laid back survivalist/crafting/farming type games, then for $7.99 you can't beat this game.  The developers are still adding content to this game, so I would certainly recommend it.  I've spent more at the movies and have been entertained far less.  After 45 hours of playing the game, this is my first impression.

UPDATE:
I am now 245 hours into this game and I still stand by my review above. There is a lot of grinding/farming and crafting, which is why we buy these kinds of games, right?

author: {'steamid': '76561198051734223', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4187, 'last_played': 1550336369}
review: Все началось костром у морского берега, а закончилось вопросом: "как так уже 10 часов утра??!". Приятная игра. Сделана старательно и регулярно обновляется. Она не вылетает в одиночной игре, а по сети пару раз всего вылетела за 30+ часов коопа. Графика приятная не режет глаз. Все сделанно для того чтобы игрок не напрягался, а просто собирал ресурсы и в свое удовольствие строил сад-огород своей мечты и жил припеваючи) Но можно и на тропу войны сходить. Боевка простая, да другая и не нужна. Если хотите приятно провести пару часиков после работы\учебы и отвлечься от земных сует, то этот продукт вам подходит. 10\10

review:
A fun game.  I have had this for some time and just forgot to write a review.  I am looking at the price of $8, and as with many of small company (or creators in general) and wonder why they cut themselves short.  For the people that buy it, in my opinion, this is well worth the price.  In my opinion, it would well be worth a $20-30 for the title as it was good in Early Access (which is when I am pretty sure I bought it originally).
Aside from that, it is a fun putz around game.  Building up from scratch to me is fun, it also has a bit of a fighting element to it.  I would say the only thing I wish it had would be ability to rotate the camera (unless it has it and I just missed it).

author: {'steamid': '76561198054666239', 'num_games_owned': 3252, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 1622, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1622, 'last_played': 1515532111}
review:
Overall a really nice game. Weakest point might be the graphical fidelity which is servicable but resembles more a mobile game than anything on PC. It is realistic but less detailed with flatter lighting. Sound is decent, some of the samples are worse, some of them create a pretty good atmosphere. My favourite place so far is the jungle which feels quite mystical at night with the look and sound provided. Some of the landscapes still look gorgeous despite the lack of detail. The world is really open, you have to reach certain points but you can pretty much go across forests, bamboo fields, etc by cutting them down. Had that kind of feeling when I tried to get my bearings back in the first Dark Souls, always on the lookout for enemies and ways to get around them. The goal is to reach a location and avoiding foes is an option. Of course you will need equipment for different circumstances so you have to gather resources, build stuff, accomplish tasks and level up which would let you build more stuff and create better equipment. This provides a simple but reliable sense of progression. It might be a little slow and might become boring after some time but it is rather fun for quite a while. Combat is pretty simplistic which gets in the way in later game especially. Other thing which is a mixed bag is the huge, box-like collision meshes which prevent you from walking through bushes or between close trees for example. Once you get used to this it can be used to create pathways and lure enemies away, other times it could potentially kill you. I died a few times due to being stuck between foliage while I was being chased.
Overall, I was generally surprised how well-made Force of Nature is. While some of the design choices might not be the best I barely had any glitch during the couple dozen hours I played. Updates are also coming out every now and then. At this price FoN is definitely a title that everyone who likes exploration based survival games should consider trying out at some point if for nothing else just for the sake of it being so different.

[u]MY OPINION: 7.5/10 (GOOD)[/u]
Graphics: 6/10
World Design: 8/10
Gameplay: 7/10
Sound: 7/10
Replay Value: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197978646869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 2817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2737, 'last_played': 1520454646}
review:
Very farmy game. Takes huge amounts of time for anything. Generally slow and calm. If you're looking for action or quick fun, this is clearly not for you. I'm lovingly calling this a work simulator because you'll spend a lot of time watching your character chop down trees and rocks while keeping the left mouse button pressed.

However, from beginning to approximately mid-game (cannot talk about late-game), I love it. There is no pressure. Time is on your side and an investment you make. Everything is controlled. Quests are designed to ease you into the game, with the learning curve being pretty much perfect. Resources are abundant, practically unlimited for all intents and purposes, and as long as you're not in a rush, you can just farm to your heart's content, killing time building your village. There is a lot of depth in the crafting system with almost no redundant resources. Most things can be used up in some way. Level progression is also interesting in that it is tied to your crafts and quests instead of character experience. Progress is saved per map and you can hop back in whenever you like.

The game has weak graphics and animation, sounds are average at best and UI management is slightly clunky, but it has an appealing feel to it. I wouldn't have bought the game had it not been recommended by a friend. Short sight range with no backdrop. You'll never stop and marvel at nature's beauty.

Multiplayer is good. Playing with a friend worked from the get-go and it was a lot of fun because everything becomes more efficient. Multiplayer is unorthodox, though:

- You cannot join mid-game. Your friend will have to stop his game and invite you to start together with him. Progress is saved though, but it can be annoying when you're in the process of doing something and someone wants to join.
- You cannot move too far away from the host. There is no splitting up like in Minecraft or Terraria, where you'll explore different areas of the map or stay at base while the other guy roams around. You're tied together with a magic rope.

Some game mechanics are questionable. Combat isn't fleshed out. Do not buy this game if you don't like chill farming and grinding games (Minecraft Survival style). If you do, this is highly recommended.

Pros
+ Ultra-chill
+ Very good crafting tree
+ Nice balance of farming, looting, harvesting and crafting
+ Multiplayer with a friend is dope
+ Automatic saves and permanent items without despawns
+ Perfect learning curve
+ Quests are just right

Cons
- Visual appeal
- Combat is weak
- Ranged combat is even worse
- UI is simple but blocky
- Multiplayer lacks freedom

author: {'steamid': '76561198205083989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 809, 'last_played': 1514512337}
review:
Adorei o game, e espero que continuem melhorando, porem para craftar certas são bem dificies de conseguir,
um exemplo que eu dou é conseguir barras de ouros, se em um objeto pede 3 barras de ouros (que é bem chatinho de fazer) imagina multiplayer, que tem de fazer 2 objetos
Seria mt bom se melhora-se isto, tirando isso, recomendo para qualquer um, ainda mais com amigos, que fica mais divertido!

author: {'steamid': '76561198178072242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1164, 'last_played': 1658948668}
review: Ich finde das Spiel klasse, vor allem wenn man es mit Freunden spielt. Das einzige Manko was ich habe, ist das System beim Multiplayer. Das man abhängig von dem Mitspielern ist sehr nervig. Wenn einer der Partner stirbt, sterben alle und dass man eine Entfernungsbegrenzung zu den Mitspielern hat ist wirklich extrem nervig und sollte unbedingt verbessert werden. Trotzdem finde ich das Spiel sehr gut.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035181229', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 813, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1573147629}
review: Gra bardzo dobra. Mimo grafiki, która może niektórych odstraszyć gameplay jest dość ciekawy i potrafi zainteresować. Jedynym minusem jest interfejs działania. Żeby zasadzić nasiona, otwrzyć drzwi do domku, czy stworzyć jakiś przedmiot itp. musimy klikać ustawiony klawisz by przejść do specjalnego interfejsu, w którym np. już njie możemy walczyć. Poza tym gra wciągająca i oby się dalej rozwijała, bo takich gier brakuje.

author: {'steamid': '76561198428589456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 19619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6270, 'last_played': 1642427004}

author: {'steamid': '76561198168732916', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 4101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 688, 'last_played': 1610200034}
review:
Hát... hogy is kezdjem...

Tényleg ajánlom a játékot, mert nagyon jól kikapcsolja az embert, de a túlélés terén vannak hiányosságok. Első szembetűnő problémám hogy az élelem egyetlen dologra alkalmas: életerő visszatöltésére. Bár rengeteg recept van, sok féle étel, teljesen feleslegesen, mert ezek nincsenek kellően kiegyensúlyozva, így elegendő kenyéren élned.... a kiartás visszatöltésére pedig napraforgó magot szoktam ropogtatni. 

A harc is elég problémás, gyakorlatilag az állatvilág veszedelmesebb bármelyik szörnynél, legalábbis még alacsony, kezdő szinteken. Másból sem áll a játék mint kattintásokból, körbe-körbe rohangálásból, és a harc végén kenyér zabálásból... 

Mindezen túl vélhetően sokat fognak még rajta csiszolni, én nagyszerű ötletnek látom a koncepciót és a megvalósítás eddigi formáját, de a harcrendszer pocsék, a craftolás pedig értékét veszti jelenleg, azt leszámítva amit egy feladat miatt kell craftolnod. A feladat ugyanis azért van, hogy szintet lépj benne. Itt nincs XP....

author: {'steamid': '76561198017699675', 'num_games_owned': 371, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1515618425}
review:
Ein absoolut cooles game. Wer es einfach ein bissel ruhiger möchte , ist hier absolut gut aufgehoben.
Das spiel , spielt sich super einfach, Crafting macht Spaß und ist nicht überdimensioniert schwer.

Spielspaß: 10/10
Grafik: 8/10
Steuerung 8/10
Crafting 8/10
Kampfsystem (einfach): 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198055716027', 'num_games_owned': 2286, 'num_reviews': 539, 'playtime_forever': 354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1546120905}
review:
Super !!! Richtig entspannend und macht auch mega viel Spaß !!!!! Schön auch, dass man zwischen Single- und Multiplayer auswählen kann sowie Sandbox!

author: {'steamid': '76561198105978836', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1369, 'last_played': 1608063884}
review: Мне нравится игра. Возможность прокачки, возможность крафта, фермерство. Всё, что нужно! Хорошо, что есть возможность игры вдвоём (хотя, конечно, лучше бы расширить круг, хотя бы до 10. Надеюсь, в будущем добавят). Есть некоторые минусы, но игра только развивается и, возможно, скоро всё будет еще лучше. Хотелось бы, чтобы, хотя бы на домашней локации, игроки могли свободно перемещаться, независя друг от друга! А так, игра хороша! Еще было бы неплохо, если бы можно было из инвентаря удалять предметы ( не выбрасывать, а удалять, чтобы они не валялись). Желаю разработчикам дальнейшего расцветания! Спасибо!

author: {'steamid': '76561198138834157', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1514839205}
review: Игра охонь, Появляешся на остраве.Видать выкинуло с моря на берег. В море растут камыши и квакают лягухи. Лес так вообще окуенен и прекрасен,Начинаются сначало суб тропики через 10 метров сосны с березами окуенно. Графа так себе, Делает все как дцп( сбор ресов, драки).Игра не очень затянула.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068881153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1059, 'last_played': 1515101081}
review:
Quite nice game with really high potential, I'm hoping that it will be still developed ;-)
For the first few levels it's bery interesting, then gets a bit grindy, but although stays fun, especially in co-op with a friend :D

Unluckily for now the co-op is limited to 2 players and also they can't move to far away from each other, or the message appears saying something like "You moved too far from other player.", and doesn't allow you to move further.

Every few weeks it seems to get an update though, this is nice ;-)
Can't wait for more that 2 players co-op ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198050891684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 2372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1349, 'last_played': 1526219943}
review:
Un jeu de survie intégralement en Français, qui supporte également le multijoueur.

Le gameplay est dans l'esprit de Don't Starve avec une vue à la 3ème personne avec une caméra libre.Vous commencez échoué sur une ile et votre but est de survivre dans un monde plein de ressources, mais également d'animaux et monstres.

Le jeu ne propose pas une construction libre, il faudra vous contenter des recettes d'objets et de les positionner sur le terrain, c'est le cas pour les différentes cabanes qui permettra d'avoir un abri intérieur.

L'aspect survie du personnage se résume surtout à maintenir sa santé et si besoin l'endurance. Les notions de faim et soif n'existant pas, manger sert uniquement pour remonter santé et endurance. Il n'y a également pas de notion d'usure des objets ou de pourrissement des denrées.

La survie s'oriente surtout dans la collecte des ressources et l'évolution du personnage et de sa base. Vous pourrez faire de la culture, de l'élevage, de la cuisine, le système est basé sur l'imbrication des ressources.

Edit : courant janvier 2018, évolution du mode multijoueur jusqu'à 4 simultanément et augmentation de la limitation d'éloignement entre les joueurs.

https://youtu.be/VLy3edBRiWs

author: {'steamid': '76561198344386942', 'num_games_owned': 806, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 937, 'last_played': 1546260483}
review:
没想到steam生涯第一篇测评会给这个游戏。Force of Nature的大陆中文译名好像是叫“自然之力”吧。为了方便，下面我用自然之力来代替英文。

首先让我说说我为什么会玩自然之力的吧。大概是3个月前的一天，我看到朋友在直播这个游戏。第一感觉就是有点像MC，看朋友玩的好像很欢乐的样子。我就同意了他的安利，加入了愿望清单。没想到第二天就打折了23333。既然打折了，那我就果断的买了。然后我一看，嗯，这个游戏有中文，就跑去问朋友。“XX君，自然之力有中文啊，你怎么用英文在直播？莫非你是连锻炼英文水平”然后他回答到“什么？这个游戏尽然有中文！”。就这件事情，我嘲笑了他一个月。

下面让我来说说这个游戏吧，首先是这个游戏适合养老。嗯，如果你性子急躁，那我的建议是不要玩这个游戏。因为这个游戏的怎么说，应该是节奏很慢。尤其是在一个人玩的时候。其次是这个游戏的翻译有点像机译，有些东西第一眼看到这个名字你可能会误解它的用途。比如说陷阱，这个陷阱不是放在地上的陷阱，而是扔出去，抓住动物的网（顺便在这里友情提示一下，至少第二次扔中才会网住）。还有就是创建的时候一个叫生存模式，一个叫创造模式。尤其是我这样的MC玩家肯定会误解创造模式。其实这个创造就是没有任务来限制你这个阶段可以制造等一系列可以用的东西的模拟，但是你得不到材料，即使没有限制也弄不来。第三点就是操作稍微有点不顺手，习惯了还好。一开始没注意有按键可以一次性收割，一次性拾取，种田重复上一部的时候，玩起来要累好多。

下面我来分享一下初期的一点经验吧。首先是可以升级就升级，不要在意体力什么的。一开始我为了节约体力，每次到体力用完才升级，浪费很多时间啊。工具、食物放在快捷栏，按数字可以快速使用、挖土的话，在对应颜色的土地上出率是100%的，出生地附近肯定有。做了鱼竿之后钓鱼，要把蚯蚓放在弹药栏。东西在地上不会消失，把没用的都丢在地上，省做箱子的材料。每次重进游戏，人会出现在出生地，怪物和动物会重置（驯服的家畜不会受到影响消失）但是植物、矿石等资源不会重置。怪我会破坏我们制造的建筑，所以不要建的和森林太近，不然怪物会直接跑过来拆家，嗯，拆你家。但是放在地上的，和个提灯那样的怪我不会拆。另外，怪物不会攻击动物，但是当我们驯服为家畜的时候，怪物会攻击家畜。房子不要乱建，虽然一些小东西可以之间搬起来换个位置，但是家只能拆掉，一想起这个就心痛。现在也就只能想到这一些，有其他的晚点我再补充吧。

自然之力这个游戏我还是挺喜欢的，每次玩都像入迷了一样，一玩就停不下来了。吓得的都不敢碰了（滑稽）。不过因为我严重的强迫症，虽然玩了这么些时间，但是我还只到第一块碎片那里。

PS：我写这一偏评论的时候已经有两个月没有玩了（天知道为什么我今天过来话这么长时间写了个测评），如果因为更新导致了和事实不服的话，请大家一定要留言说明一免误导别人。至于多人模式，我玩的时候好像刚出，我和朋友死活没有连上，所以我也不清楚多人玩会怎么样。体验过的朋友请一定要告诉我啊。

author: {'steamid': '76561198023716890', 'num_games_owned': 448, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1635768265}
review:
I tried this game out again, now that its on sale for less than a dollar and honestly, its exactly as bad as it was before. Clunky, boring, tedious, and meh. I will never play this game again, however, I can't refund at this point due to the 2 hour limit and meh, it was less than a dollar really so no point. Its designed in a very low quality way, everything just feels like extreme basics, doing the bare minimum to make a game. I'm not even sure they are working on anything at all. Only one update in the last 2 years, and it was a bug fix update (going based on the public update posts).

Creative mode in fact, is fake. It unlocks all structures and such, but you still have to play survival mode to get materials to craft or build anything. Its not -really- creative.

Old Review:
This is so boring, I'm contemplating refunding it and I haven't even tried it the full 2 hour limit.  There's no way to really fully try out much of this within two hours, but its just ridiculously boring and a bit clunky.  It even froze up on me when I changed a single graphic setting which shouldn't have frozen to begin with, right in the main menu with no graphics even loaded yet.  Had to task manager kill the process to get the game back.  I gota say, this feels like Early Access, but not labeled Early Access because of how games get a bad reputation of Early Access.

I tried creative mode just so I could try some of the later game things, only to find out Creative Mode is just no quests, but not actually creative.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044410014', 'num_games_owned': 282, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 515, 'last_played': 1514581831}
review:
At best, mediocre. You explore an island, scrabble together gear to survive, etc.

I do like it. It's a prety chill game, and I feel no pressure to speed ahead.

It's quite tedious. The control scheme to build and craft is clunky, and harvesting materials takes a long time. But after the initial excitement, it starts to feel like a grind. It could be that I'm not very far in whatever story there is, as I make an effort to hightail it back to my base before nightfall because of the darkness.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986756382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1727, 'last_played': 1514565497}
review:
This is the type of game i really enjoy, and i sank a fair few hours into it. I would love to continue to play this, but the save game refuses to load again. Twice this has happened, and i am not prepared to do it again.
The game needs a lot more stability, otherwise others will start to get annoyed with the endless repeating.
The game itself is enjoyable, yes, a grind sometimes, but fun. There could be more to do - more animals to capture, more recipies and bettwe ways to obtain stuff. 
Once they fix the stability issues, and maybe provide a save game recovery, then i will be more than happy to play this game again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154920089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 2295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2221, 'last_played': 1639680749}
review:
The game is fun at first but then after a few hours it gets annoying playing alone...
Way too repetitive.
Cannot jump or climb over any slanted hill  grounds.
Extremely limited character customization.
Stamina takes WAY too long to regain.
Very time consuming when building and crafting.
Farming takes forever too even with large amount of resources and animals.
Mining / Wood cutting takes forever.
However if they update and fix this game, I think it could have a lot of potential.
It feels like I'm playing farmville sometimes.
6/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982099505', 'num_games_owned': 1216, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2116, 'last_played': 1562972787}
review:
Első látásra nem egy 'nagy' játék.. De az első 20 perc után már rá fog jönni az ember, hogy 'aztap*csa' :D
Csak ajánlani tudom azoknak akik szeretik a craftolos, túlélős játékokat. ;)
Minden centet megér :) (3x vettem eddig meg a játékot - 1x magamnak és 2x elgifteltem)
Coop-ban teljesen más, aki teheti próbálja ki úgy is :)

Pro:
-survival game
-deep crafting
-cheap
-not a 'big' game (~500Mb)
-well optimalized!
-built in co.op mode! (beta)
-new updates.

Con:
-locked crafting by levels

author: {'steamid': '76561197993299430', 'num_games_owned': 308, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 4912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2701, 'last_played': 1533512667}
review:
This is one of the farmiest games i've ever played. I was ready for a negative review within the first few hours, after seeing the nerdy skinny white dude with a 13 year old's face that was the only choice of avatar. But then i gave him purple hair and purple shorts and kept playing.
45 hours later - eh, i guess i can't complain too much - i got my farming urges satisfied for a full year.

This is not Don't Starve. Although it's a lot like Don't Starve, except without the starving part, without stylish artwork, and without changing seasons. On the other hand it has much more micro-managed crafting, more sophisticated equipment, and slightly more involved combat (mainly because the game is 3d and your arrows actually fly in 3d space).

Basically if you're into the whole thing of having to feed the cows to get milk, using cooking table to turn milk into butter, then using the butter to create chocolate - you'll love this. Or if you're into having to burn sticks to get ember, then using ember with logs to create coal, then using coal and ore to create ingots, then  using ingots to create weapons/armor and better tools - you'll love this too. It's farm upon farm upon farm. Then you go farm the goblins for the gold coins that you can turn into gold ingots which you can use to build better weapons to farm the goblins faster.

The world was surprisingly large too, AND you can build teleporters which helps you optimize your farming.

Thinking back on all this, the only bad thing i've got to say about this game is that it's VERY farmy. But then again, that's also the good thing for a game whose goal is exactly that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221649388', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2281, 'last_played': 1646564659}

author: {'steamid': '76561198133695928', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1175, 'last_played': 1514397928}
review:
起初還是覺得很有趣的，但是人物的動作真的很不真實。
不論是揮刀的動作，還是走路都顯得很遲鈍，而且體力條的設定很差，比起體力 我覺得飢餓度比較近乎現實。
而且還有一堆杜撰的生物... 哥布林、石像什麼的......一個野外生存的遊戲大概是比較期待正常的自然生物吧......

author: {'steamid': '76561198278889411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 448, 'last_played': 1514315989}
review:
不推荐，总结以下几点。

1：好好的一个生存游戏竟然玩出了RPG的感觉，各种任务一开始就让我感觉到毒意十足，并且升级需要完成对应任务，在生存游戏中，体验不太好，尽管如此，如果处理到位也是可以接受的，显然这款游戏处理得并不是很到位。
2：等级限制，升级不但需要完成对应任务，还需要自然碎片，这个东西又极难获取，目前我也就升到9级，后面地图不但需要保暖，还需要大量解毒汤，许多灌木丛挡路，每走一步几乎都要挥动斧头，即便是找到自然碎片，你也必须十分小心，因为周围的守卫可是有点多的，而且许多建筑也被等级限制不能制造，这一点完全可以给差评了。
3：显然这款游戏在许多方面做得还不是很到位，你可能会经常被两株灌木丛挡住，而他们之中的缝隙又明显可以容纳下一个人穿过，各种不合理的设定，比如棕榈叶，后期你居然可以在一坨红色的花上面获取，有些植物看起来很柔软，实际它是一个实体，你必须挥动你那残疾一样的双手去劈砍，拿啥都不行，必须拿斧头，或许是我要求太高，毕竟这就只有几百兆的大小。
4：驯服动物，这个东西其实很简单，比如你要驯服一只母鸡，你需要走到母鸡身边，让它奔跑起来，在它迈着两只凤爪飞奔的时候丢出你手中的陷阱，如果丢中了，那么它会短暂的停留几秒钟，你需要赶紧跑过去点击驯服，而在你做这些事情的时候，千万记住，一定要将周围的怪物清理干净，否则你会和你的母鸡同伴一样被群殴，点击母鸡，你可以让它跟着你，但你需要用围栏将它们圈起来，否则它乱跑吸引来怪物，你可能需要重新造一座很小很小的房子。如果抛开那些个烦人的怪物，这或许是这个游戏为数不多的亮点，值得一提的是，后面你可以驯服这些怪物，哥布林，用链条陷阱。

暂时就先搞这么多，顺便说一句，创造模式升级还是需要自然碎片，你还是需要收集材料，只不过是建造东西没有了等级限制而已【十几块钱我都买了个什么玩意儿】。

review: This one is hard for me to review properly. This game is awesome the map, creatures and crafting are fabulous and well made but for me, I don't like its style because I'm the kind of gamer that wants to be able to clear area's of enemies without them repopulating. This game does repopulate them which is fine but for me, I don't like it. So as I said its hard to review for me because personally the inability to "clear" areas kills this game for me, but others may not mind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198351137773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1970, 'last_played': 1579172260}
review: grafikleri muhteşem olmasa da , atmosferi huzur veriyor. biraz göreceli olsa da, ben crafting sistemini beğendim. oyunun biri görev yapma, biri de serbest mod olmak üzere iki modu var. serbest mod'da her şey açık ancak başarımlar kapalı oluyor. görev modunda 11 saatlik oynama süreme rağmen daha malzemelerin yarısını bile açamadım. craft edecek bir sürü malzeme mevcut. haritada hızlı seyahat yaptıran geçiş kapısı olayı da var. kısaca ben beğendim. fiyatını da düşününce bu tarz oyunları seviyorsanız alınabilir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330224227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3340, 'last_played': 1507919564}
review: Eu joguei algum tempo este jogo e gostei mas o multiplayer não funciona. Se, por exemplo, um amigo meu criar um jogo em multiplayer e eu clicar "Multiplayer" o meu jogo automaticamente trava e fecha-se. Se o player conseguisse nadar o jogo ficava melhor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102426800', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 456, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1514165077}
review: Začátek hry je fajn. Rubání prvních surovin a stavění. Potom dojde na "boj" a dobrý pocit ze hry je pryč. Sbírání mincí - proč? Hra je celá těžkopádná, pomalá. Pomalý běh, děsný boj na blízko a katastrofální s lukem. Spousta nelogiky. Medvědi, kanci, lišky se spojují se skřety proti člověku a všichni jsou automaticky útoční, vyhladovělí, i když všude kolem nich v lese pobíhají domácí zvířata a na zemi je spousta hub a  jahod a pšenice atd. Vybiju těžkopádně skřety, jdu si domů pro kafe, protože energie je pořád málo a postel nepomáhá!, zalezu zas zpátky do lesa a skřeti tam zas čekají nanovo a otravují. Kdyby se hra zaměřila víc na přežití na ostrově a méně, nebo vůbec na nesmyslné boje a kouzla, kdyby byla plynulejší, bylo by to super. Takhle ne.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035702366', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1514154365}
review:
Not fun.

Can't swim, run or jump, which ruins exploring. Gathering, crafting and building are just painfully slow. Combat is stupid simple, and enemies are all faster than you. No story at all. Artwork is uninspired and fog hides anything beyond 20m. This game doesn't have a single thing going for it. I bought it on sale, but wouldn't recommend at any price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015295122', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 433, 'last_played': 1513778662}
review:
Купил игру и разочаровался.
1) Начну с крафта - крафт весьма скудный и однообразный - все рецепты известны заранее, но открываются при достижении уровня - никакой загадки и чувства "неизведанности".
2) Система уровней, которая в подобных играх на мой взгляд себя изжила уже давно. Уровни качаются тем, что выполняешь задания по типу "скрафтить меч", "собрать 10 золотых монет" - что-нибудь более скучное трудно придумать.
3) Бой с нпс. Боёвка нереально однообразна и уныла, нпс очень примитивные, весь бой сводится к обмену ударами, в которых вы ВСЕГДА победите 1х1. При этом устроить бой 1х1 очень легко - нпс выманиваются по одному крайне просто.
4) Строительство - очень плохая реализация строительства сооружений. Есть готовый набор - "хижина", "землянка", "шалаш" и подобное. Всё строительство сводится к тому, чтобы выбрать в каком месте поставить сооружение, ну и собрать ресурсов. Наличие или отсуствие дома никак не влияет на игру, дом нужен только чтобы поставить туда какие-то предметы, которые можно ставить только в помещении. 
5) Генерация мира - мир сгенерирован неплохо, красивые ландшафты, леса, цветочные поляны. Однако, физика всего этого процесса так же уныла. Видно что авторы не хотели заморачиваться и просто сделали, что персонаж не может пройти ни через кусты, ни через ветки деревьев, а еще и прыгать не умеет. В итоге чтобы куда-то дойти надо махать топором, рубя каждый куст на своём пути. Даже поле подсолнухов предстает для персонажа непроходимой стеной. Если пройтись по миру чуть больше быстро становится понятно, что он однообразный и никакого желания что-либо исследовать или искать - нет. Все нпс, которые вам нужны будут в радиусе 100 метров от вашего места возрождения. Единственное, что может заставить вас пойти по миру дальше - квест "найдите артефакт" для получения следующего уровня. Для того, чтобы этот артефакт найти надо скрафтить компас, который появляется в интерфейса и стрелкой показывает направление до артефакта. Я сначала обрадовался, что можно по стрелке идти и какой-то хоть интерес будет. Но потом открыл карту и разочаровался - артефакт явно отмечен на карте ) Задаешься вопросом а нафиг ты вообще тратил 20 минут жизни на этот "компас", если он абсолютно никак не используется.
6) Туман - в мире какой-то странный туман, через 30 метров уже ничего не видно, не видно неба и облаков, обзорность низкая и это портит атмосферу игры.
7) Интерфейс - возникает ощущение, что разработчики этой игры в своей жизни никогда не играли в другие игры подобного типа. Неудобно перетаскивать предметы, взаимодействие с разными верстаками, печками т.д. тоже не удобное.

Итог от меня - 3 из 10. Я не понимаю откуда берутся положительные отзывы. Эта игра для детей 6-10 лет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174682843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1325, 'last_played': 1601823531}
review:
[EDIT] J'avais posté une évaluation négative car le jeu était injouable (crashs à répétition au chargement de la carte). Mais les développeurs ont répondu à mon appel à l'aide et ont résolu le problème avec une efficacité remarquable. Du coup, j'ai pu avancer dans le jeu et me faire un avis plus complet.

Force of Nature est un super jeu de survie et de gestion pour qui aime le farming intensif. On débute en slip sur une plage et il va falloir bosser dur pour construire sa "base" et s'équiper convenablement. La nature environnante est composé d'éléments naturels exploitables, d'ennemis agressifs (gobelins, ours, renards...) et d'animaux apprivoisables.

Il n'y a pas de système d'XP. Pour monter d'un niveau, il faut réussir des quêtes qui permettent de découvrir certains aspects du jeu. Le gameplay est agréable bien que forcément répétitif, les décors sont plutôt cools et la map a l'air assez grande pour offrir de nombreuses heures de jeu. Bref, même si je n'ai pas encore découvert toutes les possibilités, le côté bac à sable et open world est franchement réussi, et font oublier les quelques défauts du jeu.

Quelques remarques :

- On aimerait vraiment pouvoir choisir le sexe de son personnage, à défaut de pouvoir personnaliser le skin.
- Quand tu aggro un ou plusieurs ennemis, rien ne sert de courir puisque les mobs te poursuivent jusqu'en enfer ! 

Voilà, pour le prix c'est un jeu à s'offrir pour tuer les longues soirées d'hiver.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081631374', 'num_games_owned': 1824, 'num_reviews': 428, 'playtime_forever': 645, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1514658516}
review:
昨天直播的时候无意间看到这个游戏
就现场买了，买了以后进游戏玩儿了2个多小时
我以为观众都不喜欢这个游戏 结果他们还觉得游戏不错？
还有一些跟风去买了这个游戏。。
我目前为止倒不是什么游戏机制有问题
我只是想走路快一点可以吗？不能shift跑 只能慢走 我快没耐心了
再者就是 玩儿到让我用陷阱捕猎 我用了大概60个陷阱 一个猎物都没捕到 
把陷阱扔出去砸中猎物但是它们直接把陷阱弄碎跑了？
一头雾水的陷阱设置让我觉得很烦躁。
等我解决了陷阱问题改好评吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198079906412', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1283, 'last_played': 1513779652}
review:
I would recommend this game but,

Bad points: 
I stopped playing this game because I lost my save file due to developer hide save file somewhere over my drive then I format my drive without knowing this and it gone (I already backed up my game via steam) and no such cloud system for save file that was how I lost my 21 hrs save file. Another problem about this game is control system that is not so friendly you have to play over an hour to figure out how to control your character, you even have to press spacebar before gap things and smash ctrl like crazy.

Good points: The crafting system is nice, there are a lot items to be crafted and use it in the journey. The world field can be manually manipulated. If you’re finding a game for exploration world and love building the base, this game is the one you can enjoy with.

Justify survival game: This game is not entirely survival game since only strategy here is to mass production hp recovery items and then keep smashing use it like crazy and you win the battles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078362963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1111, 'last_played': 1516972788}
review:
EXELENT :), franchement un tres bon jeux ou on destresse et on peut apprendre, certe les graphismes son simple, mais ce qui est simple est bon meme tres bon, je viens juste de l'acheter aujourd'hui pour moi et mon fils, et c'est tres bien car cela lui apprend certaines choses en s'amusant, bon pour moi le seul point négatif c'est qu'il y a des créatures immaginaires, mais bon ça on pourra dire que c'est à cause des amanites tue mouche , je sais pas encore les effet dans ce jeu des amanites, mais ça serais bien si ça ferais perdre de la santé si on les consommes avec effet voir des goblins mdr, juste pour l'éducation ça, mais comme je dit pas encore vue ce que ça fait dans le jeux de les consommer.
en tous cas à ce prix pour moi et mon fil c'est un tres bon moment relax, pour le multi joueur j'ai essayer, à parement ce n'est que en local, 4 joueurs d'apres ce que j'ai vue , mais c'est bien en famille ce jeu tres bien meme, en multis internet je sais pas ce que ça donnerais, moi j'aime bien comme ça.sinon suffis juste de créer soit meme le serveur pour faire rejoindre quelqu'un à l'autre bout  :).
mais en tout cas j'aime bien la simplicité de ce jeu car cela me rapel aussi mes premiers jeux pc , si vous voulez passer un bon moment relax entre père et fils ou autres c'est parfait.
voila que dire de plus : ben rien ;).

*si vous êtes comme mois à aller voir sur yt ou autres le gameplay, sachez que il y a bien aussi la traduction fr des textes, oui pas de voix car il il y a du texte pas de voie et c'est bien car on se concentre mieux  si vous êtes comme moi que la moindre voie déconcentre ;), voila un jeux qui n'est pas gourmand en ressource et ça c'est trop bien surtout pour un les genres de jeux comme cela, ça devrait etre une norme de pas etre gourmand en ressource pc pour ces jeux, car ceux que j'ai tester dans ces domaines bien sont tres gourmand pour le moment, bon apres c'est des early , mais justement lui force of nature il a tout compris il est rapide à dire son message car il est  "simple", bla bla bla mdr oui ça c'est moi lorsque je trouve des choses rare :)

ça serais bien si avec les champis tue mouche ça ferais voir justement les créatures imaginaire, il suffis juste d'un  if : en php ;) php = c ;) ça serais un boost ça ......

puis lorsque consomation bien faire un effet avant de faire apparaitre les bestioles imaginaires.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107841204', 'num_games_owned': 23, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1032, 'last_played': 1548241447}
review:
我可以昧着良心推荐它，一个很好玩的单机游戏。

但我也不得不说，爷爷我玩了10个小时换来的是永远无法跳过的BUG。自然之力碎片。
当你进入游戏生成地图时就已经奠定了你能玩到多少级，没错。因为你需要在之后的升级中获得自然之力碎片但是这个天大的BUG就这么出现了，在你8级时，指南针在地图上给你标注了一个10级的自然之力碎片。你乐的屁颠的拿着你的小铁镐一路披荆斩棘，遇神杀神，遇佛杀佛。历经千辛万苦来到了这个10级的地图时。扛起你的小锄头准备收货。特么的你就敲吧一辈子都敲不下来这块自然之力碎片。它提示你“当前等级才不能够获得自然之力碎片‘是的，你特么才8级它让你敲10级的石头，并且游戏设定里你并不能越级敲自然之力碎片。就是这么任性，就是这么认真。你无奈挣扎，通过传送门走过你一路奔波的每个角落。然后默默按下重新开始，抱着侥幸心理希望这次能够顺利点，但是当你来到第三颗自然之力碎片时，你又特么绝望了，这怪物脑瓜子上明晃晃的10级让你一下子就慌了。尼玛的老子不玩了，但是老子来不及退款。只能等作者更新。你特么倒是赶紧修复BUG啊。给我出个小花池子是特么什么意思?老子的自然之力碎片猴年马月能够敲下来？？老子精心布置的小镇就特么这么毁了。我要这铁镐有何用？

并且我能带的小弟比我等级低也就算了，为啥就能带一个？你可知道我一个人在这荒岛上有多么寂寞。？不限制小弟数量出去打架后面一群小弟那是多么惬意，多么威武？并且小弟不能够升级这一点实在是太木讷了。还有自己圈养的动物能不能一次多喂点儿？能不能出个喂食槽子？稻草人有啥用？？？能不能出一个帮助收庄稼和种庄稼的东东？老子能不能有个衣柜。你觉得我把衣服放在木桶子里不打辙吗？还有那砍不完的小草堆咋就那么烦？什么时候加入交通工具？给个自行车骑一骑也行啊。不是已经有车链子这个物件了吗？ 还有游戏中的光源能不能照远一点？我能不能有个火把带着？那夜视药水怎么就带点巫术色彩呢？传送门也很科幻啊？

好的消息是作者一直在不断更新，出更多的新建筑，中文支持也是全游戏内容，只不过刚才举例的：“当前等级才不能够获得自然之力碎片“。以及一些游戏内物品名称，确实有待更改。极有可能作者合作的中文翻译是特么个湾湾。

author: {'steamid': '76561198104651365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 801, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 801, 'last_played': 1513545692}
review: Я не знаю откуда такие положительные отзывы... Мир игры просто мертв без учатсия игрока. Коровы/свиньи/овцы и т.д. могут мирно пастись рядом с хищниками, но только до того момента, пока не будут приручены игроком - тут медведи сразу становяться голодными и злыми. Система боя... ... ... Более кривой боевки я не видел вообще за последние 20 лет компьютерных игр... По поводу боя все. О выживании... Ну как бы так по-мягче. Вобщем с первых секунд игры можно просто ни хрена не делать. Персонаж не сдохнет с голоду/холоду/болезни/нападения/ и т.д. (нужное подчеркнуть). С каждым уровнем даются задания - принести еще больше чего-то или скрафтить очередную не нужную фигню. Скипнуть время за счет сна невозможно - дрова к костре как горели на 50% так и горят хоть месяц проспи в шалаше. В принципе система питания в игре и не нужна, т.к. разработчики не придумали ничего умнее, как восстанавливать здоровье едой... и все... И ВСЕ!!! Атакуя врага, его можно просто подманивать по одному, потом оставлять игру на 10 минут и возвращаться к полностью здоровому и отдохнувшему персонажу и идти дальше в атаку. Эта игра 2007 года, а не 2017. Буду пытаться вернуть деньги за покупку, т.к. интересно было только первые пару-тройку часов игры - дальше нудятина безпросветная...

review:
Ce jeux aurait pu être bien si seulement ...
-survivre à un aggro de 3 mob lvl 1 était possible avant le lvl 8
-du coup impossible de traverser la map qui est remplit de mob cote à cote 
-perdre 2 heure de mon temps rien qu'en me préparant pour aller faire "un petit tour " , je préfère pas imaginer le grand
-14h de jeu et j'ai rien découvert  de nouveau et à peine obtenue le lvl 8
-80% de chance de mourir quand tu sors de chez toi donc de perdre beaucoup d'objet de l'inventaire
-pas de strategie comme dit et l'aventure beh ... y'en a pas ! 
-c'est juste des map où on a jeté des mob à la rache dessus , c"est très baclé 
-baissez le prix à 3€ et cela sera équitable

author: {'steamid': '76561197977419454', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1513301501}
review: The first few levels of the game are pretty fun but it turns in to a pretty boring grind.  Because there is only a few base materials to this game, higher level crafting requiers hours upon hours of grinding. New items do not realisticly increase the ability to harvest raw materials at a fast enough rate to compensate for the recipes at mid level.  I didn't even feel like finishing this game it had turned in to such a grind.  On top of that, poor fight mechanics and literally no dodging kinda hurts the exploration.  If I run in to more than one fox its trouble and I cant even kill them because they run away faster than I can run when they get to min health. So there you are, foraging and in a fight with some enemies when a couple of assholes role along to take you to super low health and you get no reward for spending the health and stamina fighting them.  leaves a pretty low feeling of achievement.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045050306', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 528, 'last_played': 1532734308}
review:
My experience so far:
After relaxing few hours I got a quest to tame an animal and got hyped to have a pet.In a forest I found a chicken and tamed it, was so happy, but then an undead goblin attacking my birbo frien and it ran away. After an epic battle between me and the goblin (Which I won barely) I saw my chicken running towards me, thought it was coming back to me and got happy, but I saw her with some friends: 3 foxes, 2 boars and a BEAR (Got mauled) . I'm still crying in my hut by the beach without any friends.

Recommended, but beware of those back-stabbing chickens.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062497887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1058, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1058, 'last_played': 1512843086}
review:
Yükleyeli yaklaşık 1 hafta oldu. Basit ve zevkli bir oyun. 

Ancak,

Farklı oyun modları olması hayati gereklilik. Şöyle ki sadece görev yaparak seviye atlama işi insanı belli bir yerden sonra sıkıyor. (deneyim puanına dayalı klasikseviye alma olan bir modu olsa fena olmaz). Bununla birlikte bazı yetenekleri seviye atladıkça geliştirebilmek (defans,saldırı,dayanıklılık, hız gibi); bazılarının ise biz yapmaya devam ettikçe artması güzel olurdu diye düşünüyorum. Misal belirli sayıda ağaç kestikten sonra ağaç keserken daha etkin (ağaç başına daha fazla "log" alabilmek) veya kılıç, gürz, ok gibi silahlar için ayrı ayrı yetenek puanları alıp hasasr,hız vb konunlarda bonus almak gibi.

Yine de gelişmeye devam edececeği belli, güzel bir oyun. Basit, bilgisayarınızı zorlamayacacak, zaman öldürmenize yardımcı olabilecek bir oyun. Fiyatı da uygun...

author: {'steamid': '76561198024996889', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1954, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1303, 'last_played': 1513734476}
review:
This game can be a grind at times but it is definitely something I enjoy sinking hours into. The worlds are massive and despite still being in development there are a lot of avenues already incorporated. 


My biggest beef is storage. Your inventory size is reasonable, but the size of the storage containers you can make are not. 8 slots per container does not allow much organization and I've ended up with an army of barrels and a whole bunch of frustration. I now just throw all my items on the ground and pick them up to sort through them.


7/10 thus far. 8/10 if they incorporate more reasonable item storage. I don't care if the resource cost is much higher... I am dying for some 20+ slot storage! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198282898647', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 518, 'last_played': 1575893843}
review: 游戏体验非常棒，内容生存、模拟、生存、经营、战斗、冒险为一体的游戏，有故事任务指导，上手度快，非常适合安逸的玩家。但你工作劳累回到家，忙了一天之后可以种种菜田，养养牲畜，探索这个未知的森林，可以双人联机，这就是我一直想要找的游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198013101783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1512359955}
review: Not particularly inspired, even for its price point.  The Level system requires materials and honestly the whole thing reminds me of a fetch quest.  There's omissions in how to do things and at the 100 minute mark, it appeared that there was going to be a  quest that was literally incompletable because the game hadn't mentioned what arcane way you were supposed to get water.  There are other games that do what this does, but better; even if they might be a couple dollars more expensive.

review: Yorumları okuduğumda , tereddüt ederek aldığım bir oyundu. Yaklaşık 3 saat oynadıktan sonra bu yorumu yapıyorum. Oyun gayet başarılı. Zengin bir craft menüsü var. Survival oyunları seviyorsanız hiç tereddüt etmeyin derim. 15 tl çok uygun bir fiyat. Adanın güzelliği olsun , yaratıklar olsun , hayvanlar olsun , her yönü ile güzel oyun. Grafiklerine laf eden arkadaşlara diyorum , 500mb lık oyundan beklentiniz neydiki? Halen  minecraft oynayan bir sürü insan var. Ki 500 mb için çokta harika grafikleri var.
