author: {'steamid': '76561198368151865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 3840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3816, 'last_played': 1603434086}
review:
This game is less than 200 mbs but it is a lot of fun, for a crafting game with many kinds of resources, it's important to have object interactions that can be felt when gathering something, like chopping down trees for example, or mining ores, the animations and sound effects feel so right and satisfying, it's one of the most important aspects for a game with this genre. It's a simple thing and many games of the same genre might have done it, but there are also quite many that don't.

Other than that, the game's progression is good, more advanced stuffs are accessible after leveling up, and each level feels like a big achievement with all the new stuffs that always bring more advantage for progressing further, even though some people say that it's grindy, it is grindy in a good way, and it gets a lot easier than before because of the new accessible stuffs. 

I like how the animals behave in this game, especially when being hunted, when their HP is low, most of the time they will run, it reminds me of hunting animals in Zelda BoTW where they run after being hit, it's similar here so we have to use bow after meleeing them. We might kill them and pick up the loots or we might lose them and lose some stamina and arrows. 

The combat mechanic needs a bit more explanation  like when using a trap, first hit will never catch them, but the second time shooting a trap to the same animal even though they already ran afar will trap them. It's quite fun so we'll have to be prepared to chase and aim. The aiming system is also confusing at first but will get used to it with more time spent.

The alchemy table is interesting with added mini experiment mechanic using ingredient dosage for getting the highest quality potions. I think that's really clever and original, never played any game with that kind of mechanic as far as I remember. 

This is a great game, small and cheap, nothing to lose having it in your steam library and the system requirement is also low, so it can be played on alt pc, maybe even on a tablet. 

I hope there will be an expansion for this game or more quests because once I've completed the game I will have no more reason to come back to it. It's a waste on the crafting system with the many recipes for stuffs, because there is no more incentive to keep crafting those stuffs if the game doesn't have any more content once we finished it.

The crafting system is also very clever, there is no wasted stuffs, everything can be used for other things. The developer is a genius. Also there is no respawn for resources, once it's chopped or gathered it's gone forever, but the whole map is full of resources, it's plenty enough to keep us stocked until beating the game.

review: While graphically it isn't the best looking survival, crafting game, it has oozes charm.  I haven't played a lot yet, but from what I have seen it is very interesting.  I like the little quality of life things like L.CTRL to pick up all and L.ALT to harvest all.  The crafting is well done.  I haven't built anything past the basic foresting and mining tools but so far what I have seen it is more than worth the $7.99 if it continues to be as fun and bugfree as what I have encountered so far.   Nice little questing system as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080730046', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1511804856}
review: Je dois dire que j'y ai passé de nombreuses heures avec plaisir,dabord en mode général et ensuite en décoratif où tout le crafting est débloqué (ce qui permet de construir un petit village à notre goût et non pas suivant les besoins du moment).Donc pour un prix raisonnable, une ambiance sympathique, un graphisme bien travaillé, une histoire simple mais plaisante, ça vaut le coût d'y jouer. Bon il y a bien une ou deux bricoles qui... comme le combat où l'on reste fixe devant l'adversaire à massacrer où être massacrer car il n'y a pas d'esquive ni de blocage ce qui devient épineux quand ils sont plusieurs (si vous jouez hardcore mourir=game over), un manque de variété au niveau des maisons et pouquoi pas quelques NPC pour parler de la pluie et du beau temps !!! Mais la communauté de ce jeux qui est très, très active (addition de matériel décoratif, plantes, aspect du personnage...etc ) résoudra peut-être cela. En tout cas j'ai aimé et je recommande.

review:
Добротно и качественная игрушка, затягивает на логистику и обслуживание региона, первичных потребностей, с переходом из "каменного" века в "бронозовый" и т.д.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221844784', 'num_games_owned': 889, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 13733, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12582, 'last_played': 1543414330}
review: Da ich eigentlich solche Spiele nicht spiele, muss ich zugeben, das mich das Spiel sehr gefesselt & fasziniert hat. Vor allem, wenn man in die verschiedenen Gegenden kommt, muss man passende Kleidung und vieles andere herstellen. Selten habe ich bei Steam so ein tolles Indie Survival Spiel gefunden, in dem die Stunden wie im Fluge vergehen. Force of Nature ist ein schönes Spiel mit viel liebe zum Detail und wunderschöner Grafik. Was mir auch sehr gut gefällt, das man es auch im Coop zocken kann. Die Entwickler bringen regelmäßig neue Updates raus, was auch keine selbst verständlichkeit ist!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198320809664', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1523, 'last_played': 1681439770}
review:
Jogo de craftar, explorar e sobreviver! Logo de cara a mecânica de movimentos é chata e meio complicada, depois dos updates a movimentação da câmera e uns bugs chatinhos nos saves e carregamentos de mapa (que era o que me incomodava demais) melhoraram. Conforme o nível sobe, aumenta a dificuldade de craftar e de matar inimigos (goblins, javalis, raposas, ursos entre outros seres). 
Os gráficos são bem legais até, agradáveis e que te instigam a explorar um baita mapa!
Por ser baseado em quests, a subida de nível vai tornando-se complicada, o que torna o jogo mais desafiador.
Gostaria muito que o multiplayer estivesse bombando mas infelizmente não (talvez por ser beta?)
Recomendo, diversão garantida!

author: {'steamid': '76561197974721625', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4010, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4010, 'last_played': 1494786472}
review: Selten habe ich ein so kleines, freundliches Spiel auf Steam gefunden, in dem man Stunden verbringen kann, ohne je große Aggression, Termindruck oder sonstiges zu bekommen. Herrlich für den Feierabend bietet dieses Spiel ein angenehmes Konzept aus freundlicher Musik, liebenswerter Gegner und jede Menge Survivalflair. Definitiv sein Geld wert!

author: {'steamid': '76561198014626499', 'num_games_owned': 7794, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2061, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2061, 'last_played': 1511413344}
review:
このゲームはよくあるサバイバルのカテゴリのゲームじゃありません。
空腹や口渇の概念がなく、水分や食料はスタミナ・ライフの回復アイテムです。
レベルアップでクラフトレシピがアンロックされるシステムですが、レベルアップの条件が要求されるお題（小屋等施設を建てる・クエストアイテムを見つける）をクリアする事なので、そういうゲームだと思ってプレーすれば値段相応だと思います。自分はセールで買いましたが。
戦闘は一応後退で回避行動はできますが、棒立ちでの殴りあいが主です。
これを書いてる時点のプレー時間は35時間弱で、後半のお題の要求される資材がなかなか大変でまだクリアできていません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198019326126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 6229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1078, 'last_played': 1631312367}
review:
Biscoitos amantegados

Ingredientes:

150 gramas de manteiga sem sal em temperatura ambiente
2/3 xícara (chá) de açúcar
2 colheres (chá) de essência de baunilha
Raspas de meia laranja (ou mais se quiser)
2 xícaras (chá) de farinha de trigo peneirada
1 pitada de sal
1/3 colher (chá) de fermento químico em pó (uma pontinha de colher)
2 colheres (sopa) de leite ou suco de laranja (só se precisar)

Preparo:

1. Misture a manteiga com o açúcar até formar uma pastinha, eu usei uma colher mesmo.
2. Acrescente o sal, as raspas, a baunilha e misture.
3. Acrescente a farinha de trigo, o fermento e misture com a mão, se sentir que a massa não está bem unida, adicione o leite ou suco.
4. A massa não pode grudar nas mãos e também não pode ficar seca.
5. Envolva em um plástico e deixe descansar uns 15 minutos na geladeira se estiver calor.
6. Abra a massa em uma bancada bem enfarinhada com espessura de mais ou menos meio centímetro. Não pode ficar muito grossa porque cresce um pouquinho.
7. Corte os biscoitos e coloque-os com um espaço de 2 cm na assadeira forrada com papel manteiga, não precisa untar.
8. Asse em forno pré aquecido a 180 graus, por mais ou menos 10 minutos, fique de olho quando o biscoito dourar nas bordas, está pronto.   

Agora que o lanche esta pronto divirta-se com esse exelente jogo!!!!!!!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198117204234', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1179, 'last_played': 1604489997}
review:
농사짓고 가축키우고 음식만들고 나무베고 돌캐고 몬스터잡고 방어구만들고 집짓고 이런거 좋아하는 분들에게 추천합니다

단점이라면 먼저 전투쪽 밸런스가 안맞아서 길가다 급사하는 경우가 종종있고 전투가 노잼입니다
그리고 건축물이나 조경쪽이 좀 부실해서 나중에 업데이트가 되면 좋겠습니다
꾸미기 좋아하는데 캐릭터도 선택권이 별로 없어서 아쉽습니다
마지막으로 캐릭터 모션이 좀 이상한데 초반에 땅파는데 캐릭터가 엉덩이를 좌우로 흔들더라구요....... 
그뒤로 게임을 지우고 있다가 최근에 다시 깔았는데 여전히 흔들면서 파더라구요...... .........(나중에 삽을 업그레이드 하면 다른 모션이라 괜찮습니다)

하지만 마카라스 흔드는 모션은 귀여워서 마음에 듭니다 챠카챠카

author: {'steamid': '76561198104485585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 704, 'last_played': 1511384687}
review:
Признаюсь, раньше меня подобные выживалки ни в коем случае не смогли бы затянуть хотя бы на час. На данный момент я  уже наиграл почти 14 часов и могу сформировать определенную оценку.
Плюсы:
Игра на типе The Forest для экономных компов.
Основная часть в добыче ресурсов и файтинге.
Присутствуют определенные задания, которые мотивируют тебя продвигаться в крафтинге, и добыче ресов.
Как уже ранне было отмечено другими комментаторами - звуки природы реально погружают в атмосферу.
Игра действительно стоит своих денег - если будет скидка, то считайте, что повезло.
Минусы:
Система боев хоть и простая, но нудная.
Основной сюжет, как таковой отсутствует, лишь присутствуют задания, которые непонятно из какого события вытекают. Например: собери компас и тот сразу укажет куда нужно идти.
Отсутствует логика (Пример с компасом)

Таким образом, я составлю вывод следующий.
Если вам надоели игры с красивой графикой, захватывающими сюжетами или же игры, в которые играете постоянно (Dota 2 CS Go), то ради расслабона и небольшого убивания времени можете поиграть в эту игру. 

Я сам студент 2 курса и у меня стало мало времени для игр, но после жестких пар, написания курсача (определенной страницы), я довольствуюсь парой часов, отдыхай за этой игрой. 
Если вам действительно понравился мой обзор, то могу сказать лишь: "Рад был помочь))"

author: {'steamid': '76561198135209526', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 989, 'last_played': 1569604394}
review:
This game is not for everyone

When i first bought the game, i thought it was going to be a normal survival crafting and building game y'know, but then i realised its way more than that, it made me deal with the problems it has very calmly and sometimes after 5 mins the problem is gone and now the problem is a way for you to keep going, thats the first thing that most people dont like, they want an easy game pretty much spoon feeding you content, but in here, you make your own stories, its mostly a very chill game, after you get your base up you will be spending most of the time crafting alot of stuff just to reach that new area that is filled with new things ( Mostly bad things that will end your life ), i learned that, the hard work i do no matter how frustrating it may be, at the end i have fun beating it, the game is so big, and its not stretched its big and filled with content, not repetative boring conte- maybe a bit repetative in some aspects but its still fun trust me, listen im not a good reviewer and i cant really explain how i feel very well so im just going to say it raw, The game makes me feel chill having fun with my best friend crafting stuff exploring areas taking care of each other its just refreshing, the game really touched deep in me even tho its not that well polished i must say, the game is good if you got the friend and the time to have a chat with your friend for hours and hours while crafting nails from your hard work iron so you make fences, chests, and many other cool things,the game has alot of problems which sucks but if you can ignore it then good for you, you just got yourself a good game, this review is taking to long im going to end it here by saying 

thank you for making this game dont stop updating it keep adding more stuff and fix the goddamn ranged combat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068659062', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 5232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5175, 'last_played': 1511491188}
review: There's 12 levels, and they are based on completing quest associated with each level. Starting out was okay. Once you hit mid to end game requirements, it's a total grind (Tedious to the point of being boring!). Movement can be improved with some items or poitions, if you don't mind collecting the materials. Like a previous review I saw, collect materials for 30 minutes so you can have an item for a 5 second fight, ugh.  I think the only thing that made it bearable is the fact the multiplayer did work, but you're VERY limited on the distance you can travel from your co-pilot. There's an achivement for completing the game on hardcore mode. No Thank You! I can not recommend this in it's current state.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007240278', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 1933, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1914, 'last_played': 1510889708}
review: The game is widely panned as "grindy". At low levels, this grind is *good* - the slowness and annoyingness of no tech no food makes tech + food rewarding. So there was payoff in the early game. But after about 20 hours progress becomes glacial. You find yourself spending half an hour at a time growing and gathering food to sustain 5 minute of attritional combat against monsters that might occasionally drop the item you need 15 of to get past the next level so that you can build the gear you need to accomplish the next quest.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057501841', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 955, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 863, 'last_played': 1557097068}
review:
In a sentence: 
- If you like crafting, and you're the type of gamer that usually indulges in MMORPGs' crafting systems, this is the game for you!
The CONS: 
- The combat system is a little bit too simplistic, but I'm sure it can and possibly will be improved with time and support. Do keep in mind, though, that battling creatures is more of a means for acquiring materials for crafting rather than a scope/rewarding experience by itself; also, it is quite challenging, and you will definitely need to gear up and skillfully consume "potions" (cocktails and bananas, that is) during combat in order to avoid death.
The PROS:
- In a way its core concept kind of reminds me of those simple puzzle games for mobile phones where you had to find all the combinations of elements and derivatives in order to create refined objects and such, with the great improvement that you have an avatar with RPG elements within this very nice precedurally generated environment of a delightful deserted island all at your disposal. A real treat for any wonna-be-stranded-on-deserted-island-self-sufficient-adventurer type of person! :)
- Since the crafting system is the core aspect of the game, let me assure you that it is well balanced and rewarding. You will find yourself running to and from the water well while you wait for sheep and cows to produce wool and milk, meanwhile trying to plant and harvest as much wheat and whatnot as fast as you can while the campfire produces coal for the foundry which itself is running at full speed and still in need of more coal, and this, and that, and all the numerous other things you have to bear in mind in order to keep production running steady.
- shooting those lame foxes while they're running away from you after a few hits is extremely satisfying, also

Cheers, 
have fun, 
and BUY this game. It's totally worth its low price.

PS: hell, if I were a game developer I'd totally do this game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198018480181', 'num_games_owned': 406, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1510684097}
review:
Игра по-принципу сделай 10 ячниц, что бы открыть строительство дома. Почему нельзя сразу весь крафт открыть? Ради справедливости отмечу, он здесь достаточно богат.
Весь геймплей построен на сборе ресурсов, духа приключений и выживания на грани смерти нет. Совсем. Боевка унылая.
Короче, после 3 часов беготни от печки к наковальне и костру, хочется пойти и утопиться в море.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972637349', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 416, 'last_played': 1510482381}
review:
まだ4時間程度ですが、感じたことをレビューさせて頂きます。

他の方も言われているように非常に「サバイバルキッズ」感があります。
私はこういった感じの、世界観やグラフィックは嫌いじゃありませんので、
悪くは無いと思います。

ただ問題は作成できる物がLvに依存するという部分です。
クエストに沿って作れるようになった物を作ってLvを上げて行くという感じ
なので、サバイバル系の自由度が全く生かせていません。
この辺を根本的に変えれば、良いゲームになると思います。
後は建物が決まった広さの小屋を置くだけで、自由な間取りで作ることが出
来ません。
Lvが上がると自由に出来たりするかどうかは分かりませんが、いまいちだと
は思います。

かる~い感じでサバイバル系のゲームをやりたい方には、良いかもしれません。
ガチでやりたい方にはオススメ出来ませんので、「Wurm Unlimited」でもやり
ましょう。

author: {'steamid': '76561198105358818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1088, 'last_played': 1510521852}
review:
First of all, I'd like to point out that I do realize this game isn't finisched yet and that I genuinely enjoyed it most of the time. That being said, there are SO many things that just hold this game back from being truly enjoyable.

1. Why.does.everything.take.FOREVER.to craft? I realize its a survival game, but I also realize that no one wants to wait 20 minutes for just enough coal to be finished to craft ONE ingot of metal. especially if you need like 5.

2. Basic combat is fine, but only if theres a sense of danger left. even with hordes of enemys attacking there is little to no chance of you being defeated, so mostly, combat only distracts you from walking from A to B.

3. Standard things like crates to store Items should NEVER require high tier materials like nails and metal ingots. Imagine playing Minecraft and having to find Iron bevor you can craft a simple chest (that then holds like a quarter of what your character inventory holds)

4. It is very unintuitive and makes you feel claustrophobic at times that you are not able to look higher than the horizon. This also influences not being able to aim higher while using bow and arrow to compensate the drop which goes against EVERY normal gamers instincts.

5. Having Stamina instead of tool decay is a fresh of breath air. It doesnt help though if your constantly run out of it because your fighting unnescecery hoards of mobs that pose no danger and only resutls in you having to wait for your stamina to refill to continue travelling.

6. Obvious stretchers and fillers resourcewise (e.g. one piece of burlap needs 3 wool to craft. a sheep wields 2 wool per shearing. one cup of coffee needs 5 coffeebeans. a plant yields 4 beans per harvest and so on)

7. Inabillity to get to far away from each other in multiplayer. Good times when you could split up and multitask (one player looting, one staying in base crafting) but have to sit arround in the base together waiting 30 minutes for 15 steaks to be cooked.

If this flaws were fixed (especially the time wasting ones), this game would be a hidden jem. Unfortunately its held back by stuff like this which defies gamers instincts.

review:
等级制约技能可以理解，但是升级方式很蛋疼有没有，我完全不想要新手指引
生存沙盒的魅力在于没有新手指引
我希望是自己来探索，而不是跳进制作组的棋盘里，这是沙盒生存游戏，不是只有一条线的旧款RPG！！
还有就是，你们不觉得徒手撸不掉一颗向日葵是一件很奇怪的事吗？这里就是！向日葵只能用斧头来撸，其他工具都撸不掉，这神特么设定，一锤子下去向日葵一点事都没？
我撸到8级就不想再撸了
===
1、我不喜欢这种升级方式
2、我讨厌这种不合理的资源收集方式
所以我给差评。

author: {'steamid': '76561198208084579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 17616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8318, 'last_played': 1678264225}
review: На Force of Nature наткнулся случайно, купил в том году, стоит копейки, при первом запуске был немного разочарован графикой и управлением, но решил всё разведать и разузнать получше. Поиграл недельку, понравилось, посоветовал другу, он тоже начал играть. Потом домашние дела и т.д. подзабил, снёс винду, сейвы потерялись. Тут недавно решил опять поиграть, у тут меня понесло! Каждый день после работы меня засасывает в Force of Nature, сижу до 2-3 часов ночи! С обновлением игры стала доступна игра по сети, теперь мы частенько играем вместе с другом, да и соло игра стала намного интересней! Сперва может показаться что игра простенькая с плохой графикой, но это глубокое заблуждение! Графика в полнее приемлемая, заняться в игре, поверьте есть чем :D Очень понравилась крафт система! Сейчас начал проходить игру в харкор режиме, - при смерти игра заканчивается и придётся начать сначала! По началу думал чё за бред, но попробовав я полностью проникся атмосферой игры! Теперь не просто бездумно бегаю и собираю ресурсы раскладывая врагов на право и на лево, а продумываю всё наперёд, приходится рассчитывать и ручную кладь и пайки, приходится постоянно мониторить карту на наличие врагов и бояться каждой лисы :) Короче игрой очень доволен! За всё время игры я ни разу не был ни в чём разочарован, за исключением некоторых мелочей и то по началу… ну а как же без этого? :) Если Вы хотите увидеть игру-гигант с многомиллионным бюджетом с супер графикой то Вам не сюда, а если хотите попробовать что то новое не удручающее, и отлично при этом провести время, то эта игра для Вас! Мне очень понравилось, игра просто супер!

author: {'steamid': '76561198032620436', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 4049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1527360478}
review:
Force of Nature is the kind of game I've been waiting on for a long time. Sadly, it's implemented too poorly to earn it a spot on my list of favorites.

There are far too many unpolished mechanics that make the game too frustrating to play, all of which could be over looked if it weren't for the primary flaw of the title and the ultimate reason I choose to not recommend this game - 

It's a resource based game with incredibly scarce resources. Everything requires a metal, and a lot of it, and metal is no where to be found.

Normally, this isn't a problem. A game that forces you out of your base and forces expansion is good except that monsters are super dangerous and drain your stats pretty heavily. This requires you to put an extrodinarily high effort into domestic efforts for fighting fuel and those efforts, while enabling you to explore and gather, don't yield particularly bountiful results. For every 5 mins you plan to spend outside of your "base" you have to spend 15 preparing consumables.

Which brings us to the scarces resource of all - your time. 

Instead of EXP, you're given a honey-do list for leveling up. Once the honey-do list is done, you're given a list of materials/resources you'll need to actually gain the level that you've already earned. This list is almost always entirely too long. 

Perhaps the biggest problem with that concept is how early it's implemented. Before you can even wear a full suit of basic leather/fur armor, you're hit with a leveling wall that will require an hour or more of gameplay. Before you can even shuck the stone tools you're using, you have to learn how to forge a bronze sword which is surprisingly not much more effective than the piece of wood you've been pounding your enemies to a pulp with at a rate that could rival only the velocity of a glacier.

Plain and simple, this game does not respect your time. With a few tweaks, it could be one of the most amazing sandbox survival titles on the steam store. Sadly, I'm not sure we'll ever see those tweaks made.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056470289', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 117768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16492, 'last_played': 1651605463}
review: Pretty good survival game, considering the reasonable price. It does get grindy after lvl 7. You spend a lot of time collecting resources and battling thru mobs to get to the end of the level and base building is limited until late levels. The combat is challenging though, and that was what made me determined to beat the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998318913', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2680, 'last_played': 1510259318}
review:
Force of grinding, c'est un jeu frustrant avec des commandes douteuses et un système de combat inexistant.

Points négatifs (ceux qui ont tué mon envie d'y rejouer):
- combat: pas d'esquive ni de blocage, vous restez là à vous en prendre plein la poire;
- combat multiples: les ennemis sont attroupés et s'appellent les uns les autres pour augmenter la foule... déjà qu'à un monstre c'est la misère...
- endurance: vous en manquerez plus que vos points de vie, et il faudra manger sans arrêt pour la faire remonter;
- système de level up: en plus des quêtes, vous devrez remplir certaines conditions dont entre autre obtenir des cristaux (drops sur les montres à 10% de chance...)

En résumé, sans un meilleur système de combat je ne veux tout simplement plus y jouer!

--------
Blackscarf

author: {'steamid': '76561198251515218', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 907, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1591104584}
review: 游戏一般，实在没有可玩的游戏可以买来消遣下。建议改进的地方，海边的芦苇能不能利用起来，编制一些东西。人物走路砍树那叫一个墨迹，希望能改进。死后出现的死神是什么鬼？？开新档竟然还有，很烦！！！人物卡模型好严重一根小树枝就能挡住你的路。哥布林如果能捉来在家帮着种地或者采集就好了。需要改进的地方非超多，暂时算是个半成品。

author: {'steamid': '76561198364531996', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1257, 'last_played': 1632820600}
review: 很耐玩的游戏 刚开始是按照新手玩得 感觉任务指引有些简单 应该在详细一些 动物喂养也很好玩 不过应该加上饲养槽 动物养多了喂起来真的很累 其他的就是营地建立后 周围刷怪 太勤 总来破坏围墙  升级的机制还需要改变 不应该是凑齐东西来升级 有一些东西是在高级怪区 级数低就去不了 去不了就升不了级 这是个死循环推荐 无聊时间多的朋友玩 最好几个基友一起玩 因为玩到后期 一个人采集建造 打猎 种植 饲养 做装备 真的很累

author: {'steamid': '76561198069640683', 'num_games_owned': 234, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1583514120}
review:
6時間ちょっとプレイしてみて感じたこと

ソロで3時間ほど、フレンドと３時間ほどやって二人で思ったのが
「サバイバルキッズ感あるよな」
でした。
道具を作り作物を育て家畜から食品加工やら色々サバイバルキッズ感あってフレンドと自分は好感触でした。

グラフィックに関しては粗い感じですが低スぺPCでもできることを考えればかなりいい点だと思われます（グラよくても面白さは変わらないので）


それからマルチの使用に関して
本来ソロでクエストを進める場合全部自分でアイテムを採取して加工して～...という流れですが
マルチでは誰かがアイテムもって入れば全員分のクエスト完了します（施設関係も同様に）

これに関しては個人的にはありかなと思いますが、別々に分けてレベルを個人個人で分けてもよかったかな？

悪い点について一つ
行動範囲ですが、二人が離れすぎているとそれ以上遠くにいけなくなります、ですので遠出する際には必ず一緒に行かなければ行動できないのが困った仕様でした
それに伴い、どちらかが死亡するとフレンドも一緒に初期リスに戻されます。
これさえなければみんなで協力しながらレベル上げもできるのになぁーっと感じました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198123955105', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 4670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4437, 'last_played': 1543247373}
review: I love the game. Very challenging at times. I see a lot of potential with it. I love that they added a multi-players aspect to it. Although it's only 1 other person. The roaming distance between both players isn't all that far right now, I do hope that changes in the future. Other than that I'm excited to see what other things the Devs do.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197986166178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6280, 'last_played': 1694552128}
review:
très bon jeu, mais attention il faudra être patient et besogneux, sinon vous ne risquez pas d'apprécier, ceci dit le concept, qui mélange plusieurs genres, l'ambiance en fait un jeu unique en son genre. 
on est assez souvent "au four et au moulin" pour le craft,.
pour les combats, le truc sera d'éviter de recevoir un pack de mobs qui ont plusieurs niveaux que vous, surtout en Hardcore, mais on peut ruser, utiliser les éléments du décor, etc pour gagner quand même...bref ça fait du bien pour changer et pour moi, une excellente surprise
(le jeu n'est pas du tout connu, c'est bizarre !!
et du coup, pas trop d'échanges possibles sur les forums)

author: {'steamid': '76561198369535790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 103829, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69743, 'last_played': 1686704718}
review: I feel this is a good game, although, it could use more stages to play than just 12. I would also make it a faster time for things to be made so it doesn't take a long time to make and harder for the Goblins to destroy. Add othe types of building such as being able to make this a city with other lives on the island.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083368332', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1482092504}
review: Eigentlich ein guter Ansatz, sympathische Pixelgrafik und das Versprechen ein entspanntes Singleplayer-Crafting-System vorzufinden. Steuerung und Interface sind leider so unzugönglich, dass sie den Spielspaß schnell verderben. Außerdem wird das Spielprinzip sehr schnell repetetiv. Man sammelt sich tot mit Rohstoffen, kämpft gegen die immer gleichen Gegner und kommt kaum anständig voran. Dazu die feste aufsichtige Kameraposition, die nicht verändert werden kann, und nach kurzer Zeit nervtötend wirkt. Die Abwesenheit von (Zwischen-)Zielen mag so gewollt sein, trägt aber nicht gerade zur Motivation bei. Leider kann ich Force of Nature daher nicht weiterempfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159294447', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 2004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1661035030}
review:
Gra godna polecenia 

typowy survival jedyny minus tej gry jaki widze to to ze nie mozna grac z wieksza iloscia ludzi 
jestem za tym by twórcy dodali mozliwosc tworzenia serwerów na max 5/10 osób 

mapa tez troszke malutka

gre moge polecic ludziom ktorzy lubia survivale , przetrwanie , ktorzy lubia rozkminiac oraz budowac

kontent gry hmm troszke slabo ze questy sa w stylu samouczkow 

samouczek a zadanie powinno byc odrebnym systemem.

z checia bede obserwowal w ktora strone tworcy porzadaja 
czy w strone survivalu gdzie czeka nas masa przygód , zadan które daja nam mozliwosc rozwijania postaci czy rzadkie przedmioty 

czy moze w strone single survival cos w stylu terrarri  gdzie tylko masz mozliwosc budowania 
rzadkich przedmiotow dopiero wtedy gdy spedzisz wiecej czasu w grze.
obecnie sprawa wyglada tak ze rozwoj postaci nie zalezy od pracowitosci gracza, a od tego ile godzin spedzisz w grze

jestem za nutka rpg z checia chcialbym zobaczyc te gre z wieloma aspektami rpg , jaskinie na koncu ktorych walczysz z bosami ktore daja ci prezenty lub niespotykane losowe przedmioty , ktore upiekszaja twoja zbroje lub jakies diamenty ktore laczysz z bronia i daja ci powiekszanie ataku czy obrony w zbroi.

polecam obecnie daje 6/10 jak pisalem wyzej brakuje mi tej nutki rpg.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211968819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1508830808}
review: Finde das Spiel nicht so gut, von der Grafikund der Idee nicht schlecht, aber bei der Steierung hapert es enorm. Zum teil ist es von ARK kopiert, nur das es hier nicht Dinos sind sondern die heutigen Tiere, und das man sie (in meinem Level) nicht zähmen kann. Für mich lohnt es sich nicht das Spiel zu kaufen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139754708', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1508797509}
review:
Interesting game, seemed to have lots of potential. Some people talk about it being tedious to grind resources, but I dont want to be spoon-fed progress. It can take whatever time it takes. 

Overall pretty ok game. 

Movement is ok, but would be better if you could move a bit faster. Swinging your weapon while moving would be an improvement. The creatures/monsters/whatever are faster than you. Meaning, if they decide to flee, which some do, you're not gonna catch em. 

Shooting with a bow is a joke, melee is the way to go in this game right now. A bit silly that you cant move through some fauna, but interesting at the same time, wouldn't say I like it, but wouldn't say I dislike it either. 

I refunded the game, but would not have, if there was a proper multiplayer. No multiplayer games available, and if you want to host your own, its for 2 people. so you and one friend. If this was like 50+ people on a server with a couple of servers to choose from, I'd have kept the game. Because lets face it, Sandbox games are not fun on singleplayer. 

A bit more work on movement/combat, and implementing proper multiplayer, and I'll def give this game a go again. Until then, hold on to your wallets, and go spend 8 Euro's on icecream for your kids or something. 

Also worth mentioning, If the game had a proper multiplayer, I would have no problem with the pricetag being 30 Euro's instead of the 8 it is right now. A price tag is irrelevant when it comes to a great game, which I do believe this has the potential to become. 

But as of right now... Force of Nature? More like no guy buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099086387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1183, 'last_played': 1632933680}
review: Basically another minecraft. However, this one adds a bit more realism to the mix and gives you a leveling system. I enjoy it. Yes it is grindy (there comes the realism) and yes there are still a few bugs to work out. When in co-op sometimes my partner will see things like stumps that I have already removed or he can't affect something. However, a relog will generally fix that. One thing I really wish they had was a way to join a game already up - for example - when my partner needs to relog to fix an issue that means we both have to log out and I have to restart the game in multiplayer for him to rejoin. I recommend this game if it's on sale (like when I picked it up).

author: {'steamid': '76561198190657217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1675, 'last_played': 1700586084}
review:
2017년 8월에 샀는데 한국어 지원 됩니다.
처음에는 시간 가는줄 모르고 했어요.
퀘스트를 꼭 해야 레벨업을 하는 시스템이 좀 어렵더라구요.
처음에는 그냥 시키는대로 하다가
답답해서 도전과제 하지 말아야지 하고 자유도 높은걸로 했어요.
금 많이 털어서 좋은 무기 만들면 편해집니다.
꽤 오래 했는데도 저는 그래도 레벨 7~8정도 몹들 밖에 못 잡아봤어요.
도대체 레벨 10 넘는 괴물들은 어떻게 레벨업을 해서 잡아야 하는지 ..
잠시 묵혀두고 나중에 돌아오겠습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030763143', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 373, 'last_played': 1518478140}
review:
So far, it's an alright game. It's simple, easty to learn, and fun. I like the combat. I like the graphics and music. It's a fun world to get lost in and explore. 

My only complaint would be that there's too much of a grind for materials. Getting five ingots together for a cooking table took a whole hour.  If you're not a fan of a slow grind, building up a base in a CG world, you won't like this one at all. I do like those kind of mechanics. I'm a slow, methodical builder type of gamer. But it is a little slow, even for me. The rewards need to come more often. In this case, the rewards are higher tiers of gear. I'm level 5 and I don't even have a single scrap of armor yet. Perhaps some rebalancing might benefit the flow of the game a bit.

Also, the ambient sound effects loop needs to be fixed. Every once in a while it just stops, goes silent for half a second and then starts up again. Immersion dies. Gotta fix that ASAP. 

Other than that, it's well worth the price. I had $8.79 worth of fun in the first half hour.

author: {'steamid': '76561198325033777', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1679346018}

The game is very fun, but the operation is too much trouble, and not with goods less, existing games such as tree of  life, very much hope that developers can simplify the operation mode, which makes the game play support handle,
Respected developers, if you see my evaluation, I hope you can update the handle as soon as possible

author: {'steamid': '76561198142382952', 'num_games_owned': 59, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5675, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2547, 'last_played': 1533133142}
review:
I thoroughly have enjoyed my time playing this game (especially considering the price).  There is a lot of time spent crafting, but I enjoy that. The crafting system seems relatively well thought out. The combat system is extremely simple. The aiming with the bow is difficult to manage at times though. It's easy to work around, but you can't really change the trajectory of your arrow. You just have to make sure you are within range of your target and at the same elevation to make the shot. 

I was most excited by my interaction with the developers of this game. I contacted them through their website whenever I experienced a bug, and they had responded and fixed the bug in 24 hours! 

I've already gotten way more time out of this game than I expected to, and I would highly recommend it to anybody looking for a crafting game. It's exactly what I had been looking for.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046035348', 'num_games_owned': 236, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1671, 'last_played': 1640135102}
review:
Eu realmente queria recomendar esse jogo. O problema gira em torno de que, quando eu procuro um jogo de sobrevivência, eu busco um certo nível de imersão que o Force of Nature simplesmente não entrega. 

Quando você vai criar algum item, você arruma os materiais, dá o comando e o item se contrói sozinho. Não há animação da personagem trabalhando, há a possibilidade de você mandar fazer vários itens e continuar explorando e isso simplesmente não concatena, na minha opinião.

É um jogo interessante, mas a falta de imersão me broxou pra continuar a jogá-lo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143385207', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3283, 'last_played': 1508078818}
review:
Ok, I'm gonna do this shortly. 

Firstly lets talk about the negative points. 

It took me 54 hours to complete. Although I didn't hurry, I didn't waste time as well. And around 70% of that time was spent to harvest raw materials and convert them to what I need. The game IS tedious, as many people mentioned. If you dont have alot of time to burn, stay away from this game

It was also very annoying to harvest until lvl 9, where you get iron pickaxe and axe. Too much material is needed, and axe swings too slow. Although harvesting gets faster after lvl 9, I was already sick of it by then. 

You cant Run! And it is maddening. Everything in the game is faster than you from bears to goblins to chickens. There is stamina, and you spend it for almost everything, why no run?

It is not realistic. Now this what people likes to talk about alot, for a survival game it is too unrealistic and unbalanced (not only combat, but also things like growing plants). HOWEVER, this is not a survival game.  Yeah I though so as well before re-checking. As mentioned its more like a management game. And you manage...your time...your off game time. Its like "I should do this to finish the game faster".

Then why like the game?

1. I had alot of time.
2. The game requires very little PC specs. It is good for old machines as well.
3. After 20th hour our so you get used to the slow axe and slow walk speed. That is, what was a problem back then you get used to it, and focus other things. Like gathering your water in time so it won't go waste.
4. It is fun to build a village size settlement from the scratch.
5. Realism demand was forsaken fast enough (This one is important!).
6. The keeps 650 MB or so in hard disk. For such a small area, it provides a huge map (less than 40% was explored) and alot of play time.
7. Most flora, from trees to stones, from palm to bushes, can be broken and harvested.
8. Very reasonable price. Price/PlayTime ratio is very good.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969326689', 'num_games_owned': 1184, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2742, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2694, 'last_played': 1555783845}
review:
This game is well worth the money.

I have payed two or three times the amount for games that provided less enjoyment. Even most of those giving the game a negative review got more than their money's worth when you look at the number of hours they played.

Keep in mind this is an indie game, but the graphics are very well done. The multiplayer is very limited but it has been a blast to play with a single friend. It is an open world management survival game. Kind of a hybrid of world or warcraft and rust (minus the multiplayer aspect). It is a grind, which I loved. If you prefer a game with high volume action and immediate gratification, then this may not be for you. On the other hand, if you prefer the games where you grind to build up your level/status, inventory, and abilities, then this game is perfect. As you improve your tools you will be able to upgrade the layout of your base and make material generation more productive. There are PLENTY of resources in the world so getting materials has not been an issue. Most of the important materials you can eventualy manufacture in your base, or are in abundant supply through out the world. Use of portals allows you to setup quick travels to points in the world you deem important. If any of this sounds interesting, you can not go wrong at the price point for this game.

Happy hunting!

author: {'steamid': '76561198001593238', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 2381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1952, 'last_played': 1508710348}
review:
I have been in love with survival games with rpg elements for years, so when this came up on sale I decided to jump on it. 

15 hours later I am writing a review of this game that has had me playing every available moment the last 2 days. Most of it has been quite enjoyable, with a few hicups in design that keep me from giving it a 10/10.

The game opens with you wearing nothing but the clothes on your body at the time, and what you have is in tatters. Collecting local resources you are able to build basic tools with the help of a nice quest/turtorial system. Within a couple of hours you have your first building and crafting structures. The level of satisfaction I had with each level unlocked and each new tool or building was palpable. The pacing is just that good. I would definitely recommend this game to anyone that likes surival games with rpg elements. I have been glued to it for the last few days and I have yet to get bored. WELL worth the money.

Overall Score: 9/10

Pros - 

Ability to destroy nearly every environment object in game

Ability to move placed objects easily, streamlining build fuctions and removing resource penalties for mistakes in settlement design

Well balanced game progression. Every new tool, weapon, and armor feels significant and affects the experience.

DEEP crafting system, so many things can be created and the progression is very logical and thought out.

Player determined teleports!


Cons - 

Tool usage could be greatly improved with a tool box kept in your settlement that allows all tools to be shared vs needless tool management that slows down crafting

Spawn points always in the same spot, would be nice if it placed you near your bed

author: {'steamid': '76561197971548533', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1552252500}
review:
Petit test du jeu vite fait...

Bien que le démmarage du jeu puisse être problématique (voir note plus bas) le jeu n'en reste pas moin très plaisant, beaucoup de travail (de beau travail) à été fait et une bonne complexité de fabrication est introduite au jeu,

Je n'ai vu aucun "lags" durant mes essaie, l'aide en jeu est excellent, graphiquement bien aussi et tout est bien expliquer..., (très beau travail des traducteur aussi qui ont donner de leur temps et, qui graçe à eux nous permettent de jouer en français..., sinon je ne l'aurais jamais acheté)

les constructions ne sont pas tout à fait comme je le pensais, par exemple pour les maisons, on ne peut pas bâtir les murs et tout, c'est du pré-construit, et les maisons sont très petite, mais à part ça, il est possible de faire un beau petit village pour nous même avec de belle décoration,

un excellent jeu pour ceux qui aime la fabrication de choses, les combats ne sont pas complexe et l'inventaire est très bien fait, bien sûr je n'ai pas tout tester le jeu au complet, mais le concept du jeu nous donne le choix de commencer le jeu avec ou sans aide, mieux vaut suivre l'aide si on ne connaît pas le jeu..., car si on commence directement avec le niveau sans aide, les achèvements Steam semble être désactiver aussi (de ce que j'ai vu), car je n'ai testé le mode sans aide que quelque temps avant de revenir au mode avec aide pour accomplir les achèvements Steam...

Le jeu n'est pas complexe car il ne tient pas en compte la faim, la soit ou le besoin de repos, la nourriture (très diversifier), et le lit ne servent que de source de regain d'énergie qui elle est dépensé durant les actions faite, tout est graphiquement bien représenté, les bananier ont l'allure de bananier, et les cocotier aussi, ect..., les lapins aussi sont très jolie à regarder, les attraper sans toujours manger que leur poussière seulement est une autre histoire par contre ha ha ha

Il n'y à pas de monstre dans le secteur du départ et vous pouvez y construire votre base sans problème, mais si vous vous éloigné un peu vous y verrai des goblins et autre animaux qui vivre tous ensemble dans le seul but de vous détruire... (tous des jaloux de mon beautiful body ha ha ha)

le jeu m'a surpris quelque fois durant mes recherche d'élément, comme par exemple en fouillant le sol pour prendre de la terre noir, j'y ai déterrer des vers de terre, ce qui m'a fait voir qu'il y avait de la pêche dans le jeu (pas tester), mais on peut prendre du poissons, ect, bien pensé, car je ne suis pas amateur de soupe aux vers de terre ha ha ha

pour les constructions, une fois faites, il est possible de les changer de plaçe sans les détruire, ect.., le positionnement des batiments est excellent, on nous donne une grille autour de notre avatar et on choisi l'endroit et on peut changé l'orientation du bâtiment, système très bient fait... 

Ha!, avant de l'oublier, plusieur semble se questionner à savoir comment capturer un goblin pour le faire combattre à nos côté, et bien j'ai fait quelque recherche et la réponse est la suivante :

quand vous voyez un goblin, faite baisser sa santé de moitié environs, ensuite utilisé l'outil (genre de fillet) pour capturer les animaux, mais n'abandonner pas, vous devrez lui envoyer environs six fois le filet correctement dessus avant qu'il ne cesse de le cassé et ensuite vous faite comme avec les animaux une fois qu'il sont dans le piège, et voilà, vous avez un nouvel ami très laid...
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][u]Problème possible lors du lancement du jeu :[/u][/b]

Pour commencer, cette partie n'est pas une évaluation du jeu, mais plus un resultat de petit test effectuer vite fait avec le démarage du jeu qui peut être problématique...,

les notes que j'inscrit ici ne sont que pour m'aider à me souvenir de tout les problèmes que j'ai pu rencontré avec le jeu (et une petite évaluation du début du jeu), et ainsi me souvenir des problèmes si je veut re-tester le jeu plus tard...

pour ceux qui lisent ceci, il n'y à rien de positif où négatif, seulement des évaluations de problèmes rencontré lors du lancement du jeu et/où des solutions trouvé aux problèmes,

je n'ai rien vu de majeur en tant que problème au départ mais plusieurs petit problèmes de départ qui finnissent par faire un casse-tête..., étant donné qu'il faut ce cassé la tête déja pour faire démmarrer le jeu et enrayé les problèmes mineur, je donnerais une note négative au jeu, mais vu le bon travail en jeu qu'il ont fait, le jeu mérite une bonne notes mais reste un problème qui je l'espère sera corrigé dans le futur par le créateur du jeu...

encore une fois, cette partie n'est pas une évalution du jeu mais une évaluation de testeur ha ha ha..., pour me rappeller qu'avec ce jeu je doit faire çi et ça pour qu'il fonctionne bien...

[b][u]Problème # 1 :[/u][/b]
La souris n'est pas configurable pour modifier les touche du jeu, seul les commande de la souris inscrit par le créateur sont autorisé, donc même si on veut configurer une souris à 5 boutons, c'est impossible, et comme les commandes de la souris n'y sont pas (sauf pour la vitesse de mouvement de l'écran), diffiçile de connaître les commandes utilisé dans le codage en dur..., (j'aurais aimé pouvoir ajouté mes propre commandes à la souris, plutôt que d'utiliser le clavier pour certaine action...)

[b][u]Problème # 2 :[/u][/b]
Pour ceux qui joue en version français, les écritures dans le jeu sont parfait, avec les accents et tout, mais quand vient le temp d'écrire quelque chose dans le jeu, il est impossible d'utilisé les accent dans le jeu , (note : ceci est souvent du à un codage unique pour clavier anglais seulement (America first, fuck the other, comme dirais Trump), puisque les fichiers de langues sont indépendant du fichier jeux pour les traduction...)

[b][u]Problème # 3 :[/u][/b]
Si vous démmarer le jeu avec le raccourci que Steam installe sur le bureau, il est fort probable que beaucoup de gens soit incapable de voir l'eau dans le jeu, ou que l'écran passe sont temps à s'intiller...,

ceci est du à cause du "Direct X 9", la solution est d'aller dans notre liste de jeu et de démarrer le jeu en "Direct X 11" à chaque fois..., (Il devrait mettre cette option du choix du "Direct X" dans les option du jeu et non seulement sous le menu des commande Steam avant de lancé le jeu...)

Donc, je continue..., mais mettre le jeu en "Direct X 11" cause une autre erreur pour ceux qui veulent jouer en format "Plein écran", le jeu crash à sa sortie la première fois à cause de cette erreur du "log file"... :

"You may not release a swap chain in full-screen mode because doing so may create thread contention (which will cause DXGI to raise a non-continuable exception). Before releasing a 
swap chain, first switch to windowed mode."

donc la solution est d'aller dans les options d'écran du jeu et de mettre le format d'écran à "lancer le jeu en mode fenêtré plein écran", ceci corrigera le problème de plantage où de gel temporaire de l'ordinateur quand on essaie de quitter le jeu...,

Le jeu semble vraiement plaisant mais comme il n'est pas en "Early acces", ce genre de problème ne devrait même pas exister,

pour le clavier sans accent où la souris non configurable, on peut vivre avec, mais pour les problèmes de directX et en plus qui nous oblige de charger le jeu autre que par l'îcone Steam sur le bureau, ça fait non professionnel...,

Ha oui!, j'allait oublier, n'essayez pas de faire un racourci de la version de démmarage du fichier du jeu "ForceOfNatureDX11.exe", cela ne fonctionne pas car Steam vous bloque lors du lancement du jeu, vous devez absolument passer par Steam aller dans votre liste de jeu, choisir le jeu faire un clique droit et choisir "démmarer avec directX11..., maintenant vous pourrez voir l'eau et vous pourrez quitter le jeu sans "crash" où gel de l'ordinateur, avec dirrectX11.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008718449', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 634, 'last_played': 1518409320}

author: {'steamid': '76561198119504638', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1558933725}
review:
This game is wonderful and holds a lot of potential, It's got something really going for it. I believe that the quest system is easy to understand, everything is easy to find and decently catagorized. I do like that you can feel like your accomplishing a lot despite the hours played, which means its grindy and that's good. It does take a while for somethings but its understandable. Once you get a system going it works out fairly well, taming animals and making fences to keep them in one spot is also fairly handy and you can make it as large or as small as you need too, which is nice. 

I do think that the game should have a running mechanic, but if you keep yout stamina and health high you should be fine. You don't even need to leave the starting area to level up until you are at least 3, I believe, and that's just to get coins to further yourself. At that stage you should be well prepared to fight the goblins or anything else that comes your way. Food items help heal and fix stamina, which is handy and you don't have to worry about a hunger bar but I'm not going to frown upon it if it's added, over all, I loved it, and I'm glad I got it as a gift.

review:
bu oyun forest + minecraft gibi ve de gerçekten parasını hakediyor. kendisine özgü ve de arkadaşların ile oynayabildiğin açık dünya. pvp si de var craft ı da var. ben az evvel bi arkadaşa hediye ettim ve de birlikte oynucaz. o pvp ben craft o getircek ben dönüştürcem hesabı. onu da geçtim müzikleri ve de oyunun aurası büyüleyici. bu paraya bunun gibi ender oyunlar bulmak zordur denemenizi tavsiye ediyorum

author: {'steamid': '76561198224835380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1630222633}
review:
Parasını hak eden bir oyun olduğunu düşünüyorum. Çok güzel planlanmış ve düşünülmüş olduğu kanısındayım.
Oyuna bir sahilde baygın halde başlıyorsunuz. Karakteriniz uyanıyor ve görevler verilmeye başlıyor. Her görev sizin gelişiminiz için gerekli. Yapmadan seviye atlayamassınız. Sıfır olarak başlıyorsunuz ve en basit bir eşyaya kadar siz üretmek zorundasınız bunun için toplama yapmanız ve avlanmanız lazım. Oyun tamamı  ile craft dediğimiz üretim sistemi üzerine kurulu ve harika. Tarımsal üretimden hayvan evcilleştirmeye ya da avlamaya kadar müthiş bir serbestlik mevcut.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029736023', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 2280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2280, 'last_played': 1507939260}
review:
Grindingception !


edit

sympa au tout debut, malheureusement on se rend vite compte que c est encore une fois un jeu pas fini .....ou alors les devs se foutent du monde !  y a tellement peu de craft et le systeme est ridicule : planter et recolter du blé ne prend que quelques secondes alors que rassembler de quoi faire dix cordes prends bien 5 minutes .....grinding mais pas dans le bon sens du terme, plus j avançais dans ce jeu plus j avais envie d'arrêter afin de reprendre un vrai crafting survival, avec vraiment plein de recette , des temps de recolte logiques et une vrai variété d objets , de craft, de construction, avec de la difficulté et de la reflexion, de la planification, pas ce foirage pour gosse......

tu veux un vrai crafting survival, en plus MMO et gratuit, permadeath et difficile, bin renseigne toi sur Salem the game (pas towns of salem!) et les client moddés associés ......

achetez pas ça c'est trop caca !

author: {'steamid': '76561198091302343', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 647, 'last_played': 1580161345}
review:
С чего бы начать...

- Грёбаные зайцы. Вручную убить эту тварь нереально, лук появляется где-то в середине игры, и тот выносит зайца только с 3 усиленых выстрелов.
- Грёбаные лисы. Та же хрень что с зайцами, ток эти твари ещё и атакуют.
- Медведя можно убить настучав ему дубиной по башке.
- Реген здоровья происходит путём обжирания грибами и ягодами по-Довакиновски.
- ГРЁБАНЫЙ УГОЛЬ. Чтобы насобирать угля нужно КАМЕННЫМ топором прорубить поляны 3 с соснами. Потом его ещё и обжегать кучу времени. На 2 части руды 5 частей угля, я калёную сталь чтоль делаю?
- Геноцид гоблинов. Гоблины пока самый доступный источник золота в игре.
- Слиток золота из гоблинских МОНЕТ. МОНЕТ, Карл!
- 3 коктеля из молока и клубничного СОКА (1 часть молока, 2 части сока (вы пытались выжать сок из КЛУБНИКИ?) позволят вам валить лес КАМЕННЫМ топором ВСЮ НОЧЬ!

Я в начале даже подумал, что в браузерку играю...

УНИЧТОЖТЕЛЬ ВРЕМЕНИ ПЛАНЕТАРНОГО МАШТАБА!

author: {'steamid': '76561198041757257', 'num_games_owned': 582, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1507333388}
review:
[h1] 16 Minuten Unzufriedenheit. [/h1]

An sich bin ich äußerst leicht zu beeindrucken, weshalb ich mir trotz relativ negativer Resonanz dieses Spiel kaufte.
Da es sich lediglich um 16 Minuten handelt,kann ich keine sonderlich Handfeste Review verfassen, möchte euch aber dennoch gerne meine Meinung mitteilen.

[b] Grafik [/b]
Die Grafik eines Spieles, dürfte niemals ein Kaufargument sein, jedoch sieht dieses Spiel schlechter aus als einige der ersten PlayStation 1-Titel, was nicht verwerflich wäre, wenn die eingeschränkte Sichtweite nicht so verdammt nervig wäre.
Ich fühlte mich seit Beginn des Spieles so, als würde ich eine billige, nicht gruselige Silent Hill Mod des ersten Teiles spielen.

[b] Gameplay [/b]
Das Gameplay basiert überwiegend auf dem typischen "sammeln und craften"-System, wie es derzeit in jedem zweiten Spiel zu finden ist. Allerdings hat das in diesem Spiel auch nur bedingt geklappt.
Eine kleine, aber auch schwerwiegende Sache, die dafür sorgte, dass "flüssiges Gameplay" hier kein Stück vorhanden ist, ist dass man nach öffnen des Inventares nicht mehr in der Lage ist, seine Kamera zu bewegen. Vielleicht stört das aber auch nur mich.

[b] Fazit [/b]
Kriegt dieses Spiel meine Kaufempfehlung?
 - Auf keinen Fall
Habe ich viel Spielerfahrung sammeln können?
 - Nicht wirklich.

Alles was ich sagen kann: Ich habe keinerlei Spaß empfunden.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041250955', 'num_games_owned': 58, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 677, 'last_played': 1610071109}
review:
Po krótkiej 5 godzinnej sesji mogę powiedzieć, że nie jest to zła gra- choćby ze względu na bardzo rozwinięty system kraftowania i otwartość świata. Czuć, że jest wniej jeszcze bardzo wiele do odkrycia. Polecam dla wszystkich szukających surwiwalu rpg na rozluźnienie, najlepiej w coopie z kimś. Ogólnie jest to gra świetna do zamulania i relaksu. Trzeba jednak wymienić problemy:

- Brak możliwości sprintu, lub skoku. Poruszanie się przypomina hybrydę Morrowinda i Gothica. 
- Ślamazarne animacje, przypominające te same tytuły co wymieniłem.
- Niezbalansowana walka, która sprawia, że przetrwanie jest zbyt proste.
- Grafika wygląda dobrze tylko z rzutu od góry. Po przełączeniu na standardową widzimy mgłe i nie wiele więcej. Widać pod względem grafiki twórcy bardzo inspirowali się... początkiem 2000s. 

Za 20 zl jakość lepsza niż gry z biedry, a bobawić się na coopie zawsze fajnie. Głównym plusem gry jest to, że zaciekawia a nie irytuje. Jeżeli twórcy zdecydują się na jej dynamiczne usprawnianie to może wyjść z niej jedna z najlepszych opcji w tym przedziale cenowym.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988984079', 'num_games_owned': 75, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1507387492}
review: I played a tiny bit of the game and i'm a little dissapointed. The concept of farming and breeding animals, clothing, building, crafting is good, very complete but the game lacks a key factor on survival games: the player feeling hunger, thirsty, cold, react to the weather. That and the lack of multiplayer made me ask for a refund, but don't get me or my review wrong. I'll buy the game again if those two key points are added to it. Look at this review as an constructive critic. Cheers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198199536503', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7956, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1561, 'last_played': 1691125271}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030585995', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 3672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1633, 'last_played': 1710124369}
review:
Очень интересная игра. 
По началу сложно привыкнуть и вообще поверить, что в это можно играть. Но игра очень затягивает. Играю исключительно в кооперативе с друзьями, т.к. это значительно ускоряет и увеселяет процесс игры. 
Интересная система крафта, большой функционал в игре. Есть возможность (вернее необходимость) создавать различную одежду, необходимую для прохождения игры. Большой выбор оружия, от палок и каменных ножей, до полной стальной брони и вооружения. Даже лук есть,  к которому большой выбор стрел (из различных материалов и с различными свойствами, типо горящей или отравленой стрелы).
Интересная система построек зданий и декораций. Различные столы для крафта, стол повара, дома, хижины, избы, даже пасика есть для добычи мёда. Не плохая система растеневодства. Даже магия присутствует, в виде порталов для телепорта или различных амулетов.
Игра сочетает в себе элементы песочницы, строительного "симулятора", выживалки, бродилки, RPG и т.д..
Присутствует некий "сюжет", который заставляет развиваться и открывать что-то новое. 
Из минусов, игра стала дорогой. Хотелось бы еще пригласить друга в игру, но ему игра не по карману. Не очень удобный обзор, хотя к нему легко привыкаешь. Отсутствие в игре бега.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197911934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1646, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1585, 'last_played': 1507141422}
review:
Play this game if you have a prophet's patience.
Crafting, building, materials and somewhat combat is simply great. On the other hand; you need to level up. To level up, you need to find shards. To find shards you need to travel. When you start travelling, you encounter a few hostile mobs and near infinite amount of trees and bushes you need to cut down. Plants just do not stop coming at you. You cannot even pass over water lillies. You need to cut them down with your axe. I cheated for "one hit harvesting". Even with that it was hours and hours of slashing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198200860642', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5707, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3990, 'last_played': 1585352795}

author: {'steamid': '76561198159075589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1506820593}
review:
En résumé : ce jeu est un simulateur de débroussaillage.

De bonnes idées au départ qui sont mal exploitées avec des crafts inutilement coûteux en resources qui ralongent artificiellement la durée de vie qui pourrait être honête (~70h) si les environnements n'étaient pas horriblement répétitifs. Quelques détails de gameplay sont assez astucieux pour rendre le crafting plus "confortable", mais encore une fois cela est gâché par le coût astronomique des crafts.
Le" leveling" du personnage est beaucoup trop rigide, trop linéaire et au final un peu inutile puisqu'il permet seulement de dévérouiller de nouveaux crafts, dispensable en bref.
Les différents biomes sont donc très répétitifs et on ne les explorera que contraint et forcé puisque toutes les resources nécessaires (sauf les gemmes et les roses) se trouve dans l'environnement de départ. L'exploration est donc le gros point noir du jeu. Quant à la rejouabilité, elle est pratiquement nule, puisque la génération aléatoire du monde ne change fondamentalement rien, puisque vous aurez les mêmes biomes arrangés un peu différement.
Les musiques sont sympas mais elles font rarement acte de présence, dommage.

Le prix du jeu jeu est honnête pour son contenuet sa durée, mais le jeu est par trop perfectible pour que je le recommande.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039538543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1768, 'last_played': 1507355646}
review:
Play time as of this review: 4 hours (17 hour review update below, game no longer recommended)

While I DO recommend this game, as it does have ALOT of potential, I do still have to give it a pretty poor rating.

First off: Survival game... NO RUN FUNCTION!... What? In any survival game sprinting is a must. Why? Are you really gonna walk when something or somebody is trying to murder you? No, if your life is on the line you're going to downright haul ass. If you're out hunting and your, now wounded, prey runs off are you going to walk after it? No. It'll get away. As it ALWAYS DOES in this game as of right now.

Second: Tedious as fuck! Now to be fair, you can start a craft and walk away. But the material farming is dredgingly slow and the count of materials from each source will have you pulling down on the sides of your face making your eyes bulge out. Sticks and Palm tree leaves should be explosively abundant. But, compared to any build costs, they are a tedious grind to gather as many as you need. A good, quick fix for this is simply to up the amount dropped from each source. Instead of a single tree only giving 6 sticks have it give 12 to 15 and take 2 to 4 fewer sqings to bring the tree down. Instead of 7 palm leaves, 10 and it takes 1 swing to bring the bush down. Unless the Dev meant this game only for children, most adults usually have full time jobs, sometimes multiple jobs, and thus don't have the time for a slow ass grind. I've been playing for almost 4 hours and have only managed to get as far as building my first hut.

Third: Swinging like a... I dunno, even the girliest of girls can swing an axe faster than that. I mean, do I really need to elaborate on this one? The player character hits really damn hard but swings soooo frickin slow, while you, the Dev, have the enemies swinging at a believable speed but hitting for much less damage and with weapons that are clearly superior to my Cudgel. Goblin with a war axe anyone? And the frickin bear!? I'm sorry, I would NOT fight a bear with a stick off the ground! The bear should hit ALOT harder. It's a fucking bear! 600+ pounds of "I'MMA EATCH YUH!" Easy fix you say? Sure, speed the player characters attack up and bring the damage down a bit, then make that bear into a proper beast. Honestly, for a naked guy with a stick the bear should kill the player in 2 hits. It's a fuckin bear!

After only 4 hours, that's really all I have found to complain about, though I'm looking forward to a female model. Just saying. But anyway, the game is really pretty, so far I love the designs and graphics and I am already in love with the simpler elements of the crafting system. The grid assisted placement is very nice, my OCD approves. The fact that most everything is breakable is nice. I can build wherever the hell I bloody well please.

That being said, I DO recomment this game as I have high hopes for it.

A few things I'd like to see added in are:

Sprinting, faster character movements, quicker material farming to reduce the tediousness, female models, modding support(modding support only helps), and maybe set it up so two or more of the same building piece will join together to form 1 big building piece(but still count as multiple building pieces). This way we can have a bigger home if we want, instead of just a bunch of smaller homes. ( I'm gonna feel dumb is that's already a thing and I just hadn't played long enough to see it yet )

Is the game worth $7.99 as it sits now? Yeah, I think 8 bucks is a fair price for it in it's current state. But with the 3 issues I listed above down right killing the game play, I do have to rate the game about a 6 out of 10 as they badly drag the immersion and enjoyability way down. Hopefully the Dev reads the reviews and takes people's input to heart as I AM enjoying this game and hope to see some of the improvements I've recommended.

17 hour review update:

So I've been playinmg for 17 hours now and can no longer recommend this game. Good looks is about all it has going for it. Material harvesting is still a slow as hell grind that doesn't leave you feeling accomplished at all. Enemy balance is beyond laughable, a goblin warrior with an axe is less of a threat than a naked man with a club AND A FOX! Yes, a tiny fox is more of a threat to the player than a goblin and a bear is barely more of a threat than a fox, dealing the same damage but taking a whole 3 more hits to kill. The painfully slow movement speed has me falling asleep just trying to run from one side of my base to the other, and my base is pretty cramped up tight mind you. The collision boxes for trees create ALOT of invisible walls between tree trunks and small bushes can not be "pushed aside" by the player. You run up to a shrubbery and can not pass through it, which makes moving across the map a HUGE pain in the ass as you constantly have to switch between your sword, which is barely more useful than your club, and your axe to chop down small bushes and shrubbery. OH, and let's not mention the fact that a sword CAN NOT cut through shrubberies and sunflower seed stalks.... What?

I don't know what is wrong with this developer's head, but this game is NOT worth money. It has great potential, but at this point I can only see it reaching that potential if the current developer steps away and allows some one else to take over. Take your money somewhere else.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043720561', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 5170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1217, 'last_played': 1688032718}
review:
This game is a bit on the fence for me... there's features I like, mostly the simplicity of some aspects of the game... and features I don't... like having to kick a bush ~10 times to harvest branches/palm leaves. I don't even mind how simplistic combat is... but where this game lost me, is traps.
To begin with, a net that you have throw at a moving target is in no way "a trap", but changing the name of the object to "net" still wouldn't have helped when you need to use it to capture animals with required materials (eggs, milk, wool) and it literally always fails the first time, even the people who talk in the forum about how they've got it all figured out, say it always takes them at least 2 traps to catch anything... and to do so, they use one, then have to chase down the animal that is now fleeing and hit it with a trap while it is running, then run over to it and get it tamed before it breaks free again...
After repeatedly playing up to the point I needed to trap something (both in the general mode (linear progression) and creative (almost open progression)) and going through 30-60 traps Not catching a single animal, I am ready to give up on this game entirely. If they fix this aspect of the game I might give it another shot, I like solo survival crafting games, but right now... I'm deleting it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198325554437', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1506418273}
review: 这是一款慢节奏游戏 不说别的 直入正题 1 怪物强大 你只能做几个小时的建筑慢慢远程消耗 2 野兽也同样强大 我三级的时候 路过一片树林里被一头野猪攻击 我反手还了一下几头野猪全部跑过来直接群殴死 [他们会主动来找你] 因此你只能攻击那些毫无搏击之类的野鸡兔子 还有他们移动速度普遍比你快 3 资源有限 而且一片荷花一片叶子都能阻挡你的行动 最恶心的是那些芦苇 挡路不说采集了还连个毛钱也没有 最令人无言的是阻挡视线 被人远程攻击都找不到 而且基本上都是树林 基本三个树精力没了 恢复又几分钟 清理至少几个小时 这我TM就忍了 一块铁锭从原材料做起 五分钟 而且那些矿物堆都他妈生长在那些野兽生成地 一下子没了你又要找 或许你采集了半个小时的资源 但你还做不起个房盖顶 4 联机 因为后期比较困难 很多人都会寻求联机 这里tmd坑的是 两个玩家距离不能过远 拜托这他妈简直是要两个人寸步不离好吗？ 一个人被怪物追杀精力不够=拖后腿 还有不能两个人分别做一些事 这严重拉慢了玩家节奏 5 总结 如果你能耐受枯燥无味无论在久也是一片绿的画面饱受随时挂机的场面       我下午买了这个游戏 跟好友联机 玩了近两小时 实际上我只玩了接近一个小时 这一个小时的过程中 我除了采集资源还是采集资源 最后直接爬倒在电脑桌上一睡到晚 半个小时后接近两小时 电脑睡眠模式自动关闭后台 总结的一点是 这个游戏并不值得买

author: {'steamid': '76561197996774777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1547823330}
review:
Tedious.... TEE-DEE-US

I read another review that said it got boring very quickly. I thought I didn't mind the complex survival/build/strategy type games so I could overcome a degree of 'boring'... but ouch. It gets boring very quickly.

VERY nice looking game. Love the free look, movement and graphics. The GUI is clean and friendly enough (Although why I have to 'take all' for items i built with my own hands.. I have to take them off myself before I can use them? Really?) however the system for finding and obtaining recipes seems long winded. Multiple clicks to get to what you need just helps make the game boring quicker. I found that the fog of war some people are complaining about to be pefectly fine, could be stretched out a bt further but meh.

The heirachy system of building items is very good and very complex so if you like a good depth of options and different constructions this is a pretty sweet little time waster.

Unfortunately for me it just felt like that, a time waster. The tedious amount of work required to get to the higher levels of the construction heirachy are painfully laborious. I didn't even get to the first palm leaf hut before I was wondering how I could put up with the collection of the resources required to build a proper wood or brick house! For example the first basic hut requires something like 20 logs, 40 sticks (I think?), 50 palm leafs... among other things like nails (which I can't even be bothered to explain the process to get to them!). To put this in perspective, to obtain palm leaves you either kick a palm tree or chop one down. Going with kicking seems sensible so you don't kill your resource. Kicking ten times gives about 1-4 leaves. So walking around to every palm tree, kicking, collecting, move, repeat, it takes some time to get that basic resource... you see where I'm going.

I imagine once you get your systems in place it would work out streamlined but I could see by the scarce rocky outcrops and the little metals they yeilded meant that travelling far and wide to collect higher end resources was going to grind me down. That was when I pulled the pin.

Combat.... is just awkward and pointless. There should be an option to switch of foes (maybe there is I didn't go that far into it)

I wanted to like the game and I certainly do like aspects of it but it is just too tedious. It's more like a job than a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198149413594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1669397029}
review:
This is a wonderful game with lots of potential.

I understand why some people don't like the game because they say that there is a lot of grinding and after a while it becomes boring. Now, I'm not saying that what they're saying is completely false, I'm just saying that it's not completely true.

First of all, you have to remember that game is still receiving content updates. When I first bought the game, there was no fishing and no multiplayer mode. The devs are active and they are very keen on adding more content.

Finally, if this were a $30 game, then I would expect a lot more from it. But it only costs $7.99! This isn't the type of game where you grind for a month straight. It's the kind of game that you play for a few days, play something else for a while, and then play again. It's like a nice 'side game' that's good for playing once in a while.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982380683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1780, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1780, 'last_played': 1505479222}
review:
Servus,

ich habe FoN einfach mal gekauft, für den Preis von 8€ dachte ich mir nicht viel falsch machen zu können. Es war dann lange Zeit (wie so viel anderes) erstmal nur in der Bibliothek.
Als ich es dann einfach mal gestartet habe, wurde ich schnell infiziert. Für mich ist FoN ein sehr schönes Game. Man fängt mit nichts an und arbeitet sich langsam voran. Die Quests helfen und erklären einem das Crafting und worum es geht.
Das viel gefarmt werden muss stimmt, und mich als totalen antigrinder stört es komischerweise nicht ^^

Nach nun ~ 30 Spielstunden und LvL 9 von mir eine klare Kaufempfehlung.
Allerdings bezieht sich dieses Review NUR auf den Singleplayer... Der Multi ist noch in der Entwicklung und wird wenn erst getestet sobald er "spielbar" ist.

review: Very grindy sandbox crafting game.  Awkward controls that take some getting used to.  Took me several hours to get pants.  I have to have a well for the water for the wheat farm, to farm wheat to feed the sheep, to turn the wool into burlap, and hunt ten bears for pelts, and kick dozens of trees for palm fronds.  This was fairly enjoyable for me, but normal people may find it annoying.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329801325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1749, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1473, 'last_played': 1562470405}
review: 这个游戏可玩性很高，情节丰富，地形多样，主线任务清晰。可还是有些美中不足，收集材料的过程固然是有趣的，但是地图上哥布林每天都会刷新，对于9级前的探图和收集物资，哥布林，野猪，狐狸，熊，这些都是非常麻烦的。还有就是攻击方式很单一，走位多数时候是没用的，只能硬刚，所以当被怪物包围的时候很容易死掉，然后丢失一些好不容易才收集到的物资。再有就是制作工艺繁杂，而且制作速度慢，这也大大减慢了游戏的进度。不过这也不失是个好游戏，希望作者能加以改进那就再好不过了。

review:
